Assassin.name: 刺客 Assassin
Assassin.publicNotes:
刺客杀人，要么是为了钱，要么为了信仰，例如宗教或政治运动。

有些刺客单独行动，挑选他们行刺的目标。其他的则是刺客公会的成员，这些组织接受杀戮委托来换取金钱，获取支持，或二者兼有。

2w1WQr635JVnsORb.name: 迅速潜行 Swift Sneak
2w1WQr635JVnsORb.description: 刺客在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneaking}时使用满速度移动。

zeH3OrBLioIRoYb5.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
zeH3OrBLioIRoYb5.description: 刺客面对8级或8级以下的、且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}、进行夹击或使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{突袭打击 Surprise Attack}的生物时，不会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态。

xhZKk4oQRgs08i0T.name: 灵巧躲避 Nimble Dodge
xhZKk4oQRgs08i0T.description:
触发 刺客是近战或远程攻击的目标，且可以看见攻击者

效果 夜贼对触发条件的攻击，在AC上获得+2环境加值。

cYpzRpaINHeW2XxC.name: 涂毒武器 Poison Weapon
cYpzRpaINHeW2XxC.description:
需求 刺客持握一把穿刺或挥砍武器，并且另一只手空着

效果 刺客将涂药涂抹在武器上。

kzNiR7bLBxL4aWfR.name: 即时备战 Quick Draw
kzNiR7bLBxL4aWfR.description: 刺客以一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interacts}动作拔出武器，然后用该武器进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes}。

ld6AdRlIeDnctV9m.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
ld6AdRlIeDnctV9m.description:
刺客对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

t5skSqnTS4aKuuan.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
t5skSqnTS4aKuuan.description: 在战斗的第一轮中，如果刺客以欺骗或隐秘进行先攻检定，尚未行动的生物都会对刺客@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Acolyte of Nethys.name: 内希斯教士 Acolyte of Nethys
Acolyte of Nethys.publicNotes:
作为下级神职人员，教士仍在学习关于他们的信仰的教义，并听从上级牧师的指示。他们每天都在虔诚的祈祷和学习中度过，隐居在寺庙里。

宗教能激励虔诚的信徒坚守信条。这些信徒中的大多数都试图带来救赎和希望，但也有一些人怀着更黑暗的动机。

Acrobat.name: Acrobat
Acrobat.publicNotes:
Acrobats perform feats of agility, balance, and strength. The acrobat is a 5th-level challenge for contests of acrobatics and the like.

Performances can serve as entertainment, expressions of beauty, or part of a shared culture.

Steady Balance.name: Steady Balance
Steady Balance.description:
When the acrobat rolls a success on an Acrobatics check, they get a critical success instead.

They aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} and can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}.

Cat Fall.name: Cat Fall
Cat Fall.description: The acrobat treats all falls as 50 feet shorter.

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 The acrobat is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see

效果 The acrobat gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The acrobat deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Swinging Strike.name: Swinging Strike
Swinging Strike.description: The acrobat swings on a rope or trapeze, moving up to double their Speed. At any point during the swing, they can make a melee Strike.

Adept.name: Adept
Adept.publicNotes:
Adepts have unlocked only the most minor occult mysteries of the universe. A few are chosen by accomplished practitioners for further training. Others volunteer to join a cabal by passing an initiation ritual.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Focused Thinker.name: Focused Thinker
Focused Thinker.description: The adept focuses inward to muster knowledge and wisdom. While in this state of concentration, they gain a +2 status bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}, but take a -2 penalty to Perception. They can end their focused state with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Advisor.name: 顾问 Advisor
Advisor.publicNotes:
顾问深受王庭信任，他们在掌权者耳边提供指导性的建议。许多贵族如此倚重于顾问的建议以至于他们几乎无法在没有顾问的情况下做决定，并且要求顾问出席所有的会议和公共活动。顾问往往是操弄的大师，他们的指导往往能塑造一个男爵领甚至一个王国——无论是好是坏。

虽然冒险家们穿过黑暗的地牢，跨过危险的荒野，但有时候对他们来说最险象环生的地方其实是贵族宫廷。

Placate.name: 抚慰 Placate
Placate.description: 顾问善于安抚焦躁不安的贵族。当与贵族成员打交道时，他们舒缓的嗓音使他们的欺骗和外交检定获得+2环境加值。

Antipaladin.name: Antipaladin
Antipaladin.publicNotes:
There is perhaps nothing more anathematic to peace than an antipaladin. Dedicated holy warriors to the darkest and foulest of deities, antipaladins work to fulfill the vile wishes of their evil masters. The zeal with which they implement the plans of dark gods makes them truly fearsome foes for anyone allied with the forces of good.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Destructive Vengeance.name: Destructive Vengeance
Destructive Vengeance.description:
触发 An enemy within 15 feet damages the antipaladin

效果 The antipaladin increases the amount of damage [[/r {2d6}]]{they take by 2d6} and deals 2d6 to the triggering enemy, choosing [[/r {2d6}[evil]]]{evil damage} or [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{negative damage}. In addition, the antipaladin deals [[/r {2}]]{2 extra damage} of the chosen type with their Strikes against the triggering creature until the end of the antipaladin's next turn.

Intimidating Strike.name: Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: The antipaladin makes a melee Strike. If they hit and deal damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical hit.

Apothecary.name: Apothecary
Apothecary.publicNotes:
Surrounded by bottles and bins of crushed herbs, curative minerals, and potent extracts, the apothecary skillfully combines materials into unguents and medicines. For encounters involving making medicine or alchemical contests, the apothecary is a 3rd-level challenge.

The world is a dangerous place. Thankfully, there are those who devote their lives to easing the pain and suffering of others.

D91SDgzufetsXtHT.name: Acid Flask
D91SDgzufetsXtHT.description: [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} and [[/r {1}[splash,acid]]]{1 Acid Splash damage}

Medical Wisdom.name: Medical Wisdom
Medical Wisdom.description: The apothecary can identify the effect of any alchemical composition or medical ingredient using only their senses. This typically takes 1 minute.

+1 circumstance bonus on saves vs. poiso.name: +1 circumstance bonus on saves vs. poisons

Apprentice.name: Apprentice
Apprentice.publicNotes:
Ambitious apprentices can be found in all cities. These individuals are generally younger and seek the approval of their masters as they learn their craft. Many yearn to exemplify the artistry behind their craft, one day becoming masters themselves. Depicted below is an apprentice cartographer.

Every settlement needs tradespeople to create new products, facilitate commerce, and keep the infrastructure from crumbling. Larger cities often have entire guilds dedicated to the creation of specific goods, managing worker conditions, and working with local governments.

Apprentice's Ambition.name: Apprentice's Ambition
Apprentice's Ambition.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 A direct superior is supervising the apprentice

效果 The apprentice gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of their next turn.

Archer Sentry.name: Archer Sentry
Archer Sentry.publicNotes:
Archer sentries slightly outrank the rank-and-file guards, taking positions on walls, garrisons, and other important locations where they can stay out of the fray and pick off criminals or assailants.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Sentry's Aim.name: Sentry's Aim
Sentry's Aim.description:
The archer sentry aims carefully and fires. They make a ranged weapon Strike with a +1 circumstance bonus.

The Strike ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{concealed} condition, lesser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{cover}, and standard cover, and reduces greater cover to standard cover.

Astronomer.name: Astronomer
Astronomer.publicNotes:
Different cultures have created stories of the hows and whys of the universe, if things exist beyond the stars, and if the gods manipulate the heavenly bodies. But astronomers aren't interested in folktales-they desire truth.

True power comes from knowledge: the power to shape the growth of kingdoms by mere whispers, staying three steps ahead of adversaries, or even knowing which flora is best for creating untraceable poisons.

Living Sextant.name: Living Sextant
Living Sextant.description: If the astronomer is able to see the night sky, they can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{Sense Direction} using a [[/br 1d20+10 #Sense Direction]]{+10 modifier}.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Casts a Spell} the astronomer has prepared

效果 The astronomer expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. The astronomer loses its spell slot as if it had cast the triggering spell. The astronomer then attempts to counteract the triggering spell.

Azarketi Crab Catcher.name: Azarketi Crab Catcher
Azarketi Crab Catcher.publicNotes:
Azarketis, also known as Low Azlanti or gillmen, can be found all over Golarion, with a particularly high concentration around Absalom and the Inner Sea. Descendants of the ancient Azlanti, the azarketis survived the cataclysm of Earthfall by fleeing into the sea, where they were warped into amphibious forms by the alghollthu, the alien architects of Absalom's terrible demise. Generally found on the coast, azarketis favor life near a major body of water, as keeping their skin hydrated is a biological requirement. Though most azarketis live relatively peaceful lives of fishing or farming, they sometimes need to defend their homes against hostile forces, and some leave their communities to become adventurers. The following statistics may be used to represent commonly encountered azarketis.

The average azarketi citizen in Absalom makes a living fishing or catching crabs. The deep harbor floor beneath the city docks is covered with traps left by the azarketis, who use individual glyphs to mark one crabber's trap from the other.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.description: Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to suffocate until returned to water.

Submerged Stealth.name: Submerged Stealth
Submerged Stealth.description: While submerged in water, an azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their Stealth check, indicated above.

Swim Away.name: Swim Away
Swim Away.description:
需求 The azarketi crab catcher is swimming

触发 The azarketi crab catcher is targeted with an attack and can see the attacker

效果 The azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack, they Swim 5 feet.

Azarketi Sailor.name: Azarketi Sailor
Azarketi Sailor.publicNotes:
Azarketis, also known as Low Azlanti or gillmen, can be found all over Golarion, with a particularly high concentration around Absalom and the Inner Sea. Descendants of the ancient Azlanti, the azarketis survived the cataclysm of Earthfall by fleeing into the sea, where they were warped into amphibious forms by the alghollthu, the alien architects of Absalom's terrible demise. Generally found on the coast, azarketis favor life near a major body of water, as keeping their skin hydrated is a biological requirement. Though most azarketis live relatively peaceful lives of fishing or farming, they sometimes need to defend their homes against hostile forces, and some leave their communities to become adventurers. The following statistics may be used to represent commonly encountered azarketis.

Azarketis with more adventurous spirits often learn the art of sailing and join the crew of a ship. Such sailors get to enjoy their time above deck while also having near-constant access to large bodies of water. Ship captains also appreciate having azarketis on board, as they're able to easily scrape barnacles off the hull, check the rudder, and help patch any leaks. Though they have a talent for swimming more than sailing, they've earned a reputation as lucky to have on board.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.description: Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to suffocate until returned to water.

Sea Legs.name: Sea Legs
Sea Legs.description: An azarketi sailor gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} and can roll twice and take the better result on checks to Balance while aboard a ship.

Submerged Stealth.name: Submerged Stealth
Submerged Stealth.description: While submerged in water, an azarketi sailor gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their Stealth check, indicated above.

Swinging Strike.name: Swinging Strike
Swinging Strike.description:
需求 The azarketi sailor is hanging from a rope or vine

效果 The azarketi sailor swings a distance equal to up to twice their Speed, moving in a straight line, and makes a single Strike at any point during the movement.

Azarketi Tide Tamer.name: Azarketi Tide Tamer
Azarketi Tide Tamer.publicNotes:
Azarketis, also known as Low Azlanti or gillmen, can be found all over Golarion, with a particularly high concentration around Absalom and the Inner Sea. Descendants of the ancient Azlanti, the azarketis survived the cataclysm of Earthfall by fleeing into the sea, where they were warped into amphibious forms by the alghollthu, the alien architects of Absalom's terrible demise. Generally found on the coast, azarketis favor life near a major body of water, as keeping their skin hydrated is a biological requirement. Though most azarketis live relatively peaceful lives of fishing or farming, they sometimes need to defend their homes against hostile forces, and some leave their communities to become adventurers. The following statistics may be used to represent commonly encountered azarketis.

The most ambitious and capable azarketis become tide tamers, learning how to speak with aquatic animals and even train the strongest of these creatures to help defend their territory. Tide tamers act as guardians for their communities, scouts at sea and on the shore, or even entertainers for land-bound people's amusement. They're generally found with one or more aquatic allies whom they've befriended. Several serve alongside Absalom's Wave Riders as scouts, animal interlocutors, and guides.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.description: Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to suffocate until returned to water.

Speaker of the Oceans.name: Speaker of the Oceans
Speaker of the Oceans.description: An azarketi tide tamer can speak with animals that have the aquatic or amphibious trait.

Submerged Stealth.name: Submerged Stealth
Submerged Stealth.description: While submerged in water, an azarketi tide tamer gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their Stealth check, indicated above.

Aquatic Predator.name: Aquatic Predator
Aquatic Predator.description: While submerged in water, an azarketi tide tamer takes advantage of the shifting tides to increase the deadliness of their attacks. They deal [[/r 2d8]] additional damage on a successful weapon Strike while they are underwater.

Bandit.name: 强盗 Bandit
Bandit.publicNotes:
强盗通过在乡野地区例如森林或山脉中设置隐藏的陷阱来劫掠旅行者，并在得手后立即逃回自己的藏身之处。许多强盗在活捉受害者之后会将其放走，但是也有一些不愿意留下目击者。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

Bandit's Ambush.name: 强盗伏击 Bandit's Ambush
Bandit's Ambush.description: 当强盗使用欺骗或隐秘进行先攻检定时，他们可以尝试以一个自由动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。

Dread Stalker.name: 恐怖袭击 Dread Stalker
Dread Stalker.description: 陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}的生物对强盗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Favored Terrain.name: 偏好地形 Favored Terrain
Favored Terrain.description: 强盗无视森林中的非魔法的困难地形效果。

Barkeep.name: Barkeep
Barkeep.publicNotes:
Barkeeps are often friends and mentors within a community, lending an ear while supplying libations. The best barkeeps have some talent for storytelling and passing on valuable advice.

Countless adventures begin in a tavern or a pub. Maybe it's because such places attract the risk-prone, or maybe it's because everyone needs a little liquid courage before they decide to take on a group of rampaging ogres.

Bar Brawler.name: Bar Brawler
Bar Brawler.description: The barkeep has been in enough bar fights to know how to throw a few punches. When fighting in their bar and making a nonlethal attack, the barkeep gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and deals an additional [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4 damage}.

Barkeep's Advice.name: Barkeep's Advice
Barkeep's Advice.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The barkeep gives some pertinent advice to a single creature other than themself. For 24 hours, when that creature fails a skill check or saving throw, they can recall this advice and reroll the check, using the second result instead. Once that creature uses this ability, its effect ends.

A creature that receives the Barkeep's Advice is temporarily immune to the ability for 1 month.

Barrister.name: Barrister
Barrister.publicNotes:
Barristers may serve as criminal prosecutors or as legal advocates, defending the rights of those accused of crimes or named as defendants in civil cases. In a court case or other legal proceeding, the barrister is a 4th-level challenge.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Sway the Judge and Jury.name: Sway the Judge and Jury
Sway the Judge and Jury.description:
A barrister gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} something of the deciding members within a courtroom.

If the barrister successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Performs} against a @Check[type:performance|dc:20] during the 20 minutes prior to the check, they increase the circumstance bonus to +4.

Cite Precedent.name: Cite Precedent
Cite Precedent.description:
The barrister uses existing case law to undermine their opposition. If they succeed at a @Check[type:legal-lore|dc:20]{Legal Lore} check, they impose a -2 circumstance penalty on the next Diplomacy check an opponent attempts in a legal argument.

Any further attempts to Cite Precedent fail until a new topic with different precedents is being argued.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.KdV8UtN8Af5oCerj]{效果: Cite Precedent}

Beast Tamer.name: Beast Tamer
Beast Tamer.publicNotes:
Beast tamers bring the wild to civilization, rearing and training creatures to follow their commands and perform flashy tricks that entertain audiences.

Performances can serve as entertainment, expressions of beauty, or part of a shared culture.

Wild Empathy.name: Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: The beast tamer can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} on animals and to make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them.

Trained Animal.name: Trained Animal
Trained Animal.description:
The beast tamer fights alongside a trained animal ally of its level or lower, most likely a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{Tiger}. The animal has the standard number of actions, uses its normal stat block, and counts toward the encounter's XP budget normally.

The beast tamer can spend 1 action to gain the support benefit appropriate to its trained animal. Unlike for an animal companion, this doesn't require the animal to use any of its actions.

Beggar.name: 乞丐 Beggar
Beggar.publicNotes:
哪里有贫穷，哪里就有乞丐。乞丐实际上是被社会践踏的底层人民——由于种种挫败和环境的毒打导致被迫流落街头的人。有些乞丐为黑社会组织工作，如放哨、作为间谍等，甚至是廉价的雇佣兵——他们有时是自愿的，但大多数情况下不是。

不幸的是，每个社会都有生活在底层的人。虽然好的社区会为底层人民提供帮助，但是有时——由于经济衰退、饥荒或战争——社会无力负担这些不幸的人。在无情的中立或邪恶的社会中，贫穷是一种不可避免的现象，永远无法真正根除，而更糟糕的情况是，贫穷被当做一种被操纵用来获取整治利益的工具。

Beat a Retreat.name: 马上撤退 Beat a Retreat
Beat a Retreat.description: 乞丐进行三次行走，并在这些行动期间AC获得+2环境加值。

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.publicNotes:
Hired to protect someone famous or powerful, bodyguards use intimidation, quick wits, and martial skill to keep their charges safe. Such mercenaries might be auxiliaries to a noble's own guards, but with special directives to safeguard their patrons.

A broad category that includes those wielding arms, spells, or even guile and cunning, mercenaries hire themselves and their expertise to those with the gold to pay for it.

Bodyguard's Defense.name: Bodyguard's Defense
Bodyguard's Defense.description:
The bodyguard selects one creature they can see and hear within 30 feet. That creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as the bodyguard is adjacent to the chosen creature and can act; this bonus lasts until the start of the bodyguard's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.IfUod2VxNmZMGGPq]{效果: Bodyguard's Defense}

Bosun.name: Bosun
Bosun.publicNotes:
A ship's boatswain, or bosun, leads the deckhands who maintain the ship.

Adventurers may need passage on a swift vessel, or they might face danger from raiders at sea or in coastal settlements.

Bosun's Command.name: Bosun's Command
Bosun's Command.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The bosun orders an ally to attack or to get in position. Until the end of the ally's next turn, they gain the bosun's choice of a +2 status bonus to attack rolls or a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.WfiaKdXNSxC3POcs]{效果: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.yG27Ixwdpxqbrhzf]{效果: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus}

Pike and Strike.name: Pike and Strike
Pike and Strike.description:
The bosun Strikes with their naval pike.

If this Strike hits, the bosun can either move the target 5 feet within the pike's reach or make a fist Strike against the target without increasing their multiple attack penalty until after the fist Strike.

Bounty Hunter.name: Bounty Hunter
Bounty Hunter.publicNotes:
Bounty hunters are constantly on the move, whether within city walls or the wilderness, trailing their fugitive quarries for capture... or disposal. Often relying on stealth or deception as much as martial skill, bounty hunters employ a vast array of talents to accomplish their goals, not to mention to collect the hefty payout that follows.

A broad category that includes those wielding arms, spells, or even guile and cunning, mercenaries hire themselves and their expertise to those with the gold to pay for it.

Hunt Prey.name: Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description: The bounty hunter designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}, as their prey. The bounty hunter gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} the prey and to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track} the prey. This effect lasts until the bounty hunter uses again.

Precision Edge.name: Precision Edge
Precision Edge.description: The first time the bounty hunter hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal an additional [[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害}.

Running Reload.name: Running Reload
Running Reload.description: The bounty hunter Strides, Steps, or Sneaks, and then Interacts to reload.

Burglar.name: 夜贼 Burglar
Burglar.publicNotes:
夜贼专门撬门而入对家庭或企业实施偷窃。这些罪犯专注于寻找安全的路径进入建筑物内部，绕过陷阱和其他安保措施，同时保证自己不被发现。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

+1 circumstance to saves vs. traps.name: 对抗陷阱全豁免+1环境加值

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 夜贼面对4级或4级以下的、且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}、进行夹击或使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{突袭打击 Surprise Attack}的生物时，不会陷入措手不及状态。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧闪避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 夜贼是近战或远程攻击的目标，且夜贼可以看见攻击者；

效果 夜贼对触发条件的攻击，在AC上获得+2环境加值。

Mobility.name: 灵活移动 Mobility
Mobility.description: 当夜贼以半速或更低速度行走时，该移动不触发反应动作。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
夜贼对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 在战斗的第一轮中，如果夜贼以欺骗或隐秘进行先攻检定，尚未行动的生物都会对夜贼@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Captain Of The Guard.name: Captain Of The Guard
Captain Of The Guard.publicNotes:
The captain of the guard leads a troop of soldiers who serve as security forces for a powerful individual, most often a high-ranking noble or very rich merchant, though this stat block could also represent a lower-ranking captain of the guard for the leader of a nation. A formidable opponent in their own right, the captain of the guard skillfully employs their troops to protect the life and health of their ward.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Aura of Command.name: Aura of Command
Aura of Command.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The captain of the guard bolsters lower-level guards under their command, granting them a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to their Will saves.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.OxOMYmlPtjsEkRtY]{效果: Aura of Command}

Bravery.name: Bravery
Bravery.description: When the captain of the guard rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

Shield Warden.name: Shield Warden
Shield Warden.description: When the captain has their shield raised, they can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.m4HQ2o5aPxjXf2kY]{Shield Block} when an attack is made against an adjacent ally. If they do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of the captain.

Shielded Advance.name: Shielded Advance
Shielded Advance.description:
需求 The captain of the guard has their shield raised

效果 The captain of the guard presses forward, using their shield to push back foes.

The captain Strides and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shoves}, in either order. The multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Shove, though the Shove does count toward the captain's multiple attack penalty.

Changeling Hellknight.name: 替换儿地狱骑士 Changeling Hellknight
Changeling Hellknight.tokenName: 替换儿地狱骑士 Changeling Hellknight

Charlatan.name: 骗子 Charlatan
Charlatan.publicNotes:
骗子利用伪装和误导从毫无戒心和糊涂的人手里诈骗金钱或其他贵重物品。通过天花乱坠的吹嘘转移受害者的注意力来扒窃他们的口袋，或者伪造灵媒等都是典型的诈骗手段。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

Versatile Performance.name: 多才表演者 Versatile Performance
Versatile Performance.description: 骗子可以用表演取代交涉来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}，用表演取代威吓来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}，他们也可以用表演检定进行欺骗检定或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
骗子对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Charming Scoundrel.name: 迷人恶棍 Charming Scoundrel
Charming Scoundrel.publicNotes:
这个英俊的侏儒留着令人印象深刻的发型，穿着浮夸的华服，吸引无数眼球。

大多数火烙党成员都很享受自己的“功绩”带来的关注度，而迷人恶棍则更极端，经常吹嘘自己的英勇事迹，并试图利用这些臭名昭著的事迹来换取免费的饮料和住宿。这些歹徒认为，只要当地执法部门没有介入调查的意向，则把该组织的全部恶行都归于自己名下也没有什么坏处。他们很可能会承接一些火烙党内的引人注目的任务，只是为了以后可以兴致勃勃地吹嘘自己的履历。

迷人恶棍在战斗中和战斗外一样戏精，经常在对手之间反复横跳，用华丽的剑术把人弄晕。如果战斗进行得很顺利，这些无赖之徒就会对步伐缓慢的对手大声嘲笑，或者给盟友鼓劲。尽管这些无赖之徒傲慢且好胜心强，但本质上还是实用主义者，如果运气似乎不在他们这边，他们会把巧妙地逃脱作为保留剧目。

哪里有压迫和冒险的机会，哪里就有火烙党尾随而至。PC遭遇的这些火烙党成员可能是寻求正义、反抗奴隶主压迫的盟友，或者是和PC怀着同样目的去争夺某处宝藏的友好（或不那么友好）的竞争对手。这里列出的“迷人的恶棍”可以作为低级的自由斗士或阻碍PC们的对手登场，或者是作为后面“私掠船长”手下的船员。而“私掠船长”可以为PC提供前往危险地点的运输工具，或亦敌亦友，在最意想不到的情况下提供及时的支援，也能充当和PC相互竞争的探险家，也可以作为强大而致命的敌人登场。

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 迷人恶棍在面对小于等于4级的、且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}、进行夹击或使用突袭打击的生物时，不会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态。

Advancing Flourish.name: 浮夸进击 Advancing Flourish
Advancing Flourish.description: 迷人恶棍行走两次。如果他们在一个敌人的近战触及内结束行动，则他们能进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}。

Chronicler.name: 传记作家 Chronicler
Chronicler.publicNotes:
如果没有留下传记的话，探险的意义就不大了。探险队的成员非常珍惜这些能记录他们事迹的传记作家。

世界是广阔而充满危险的。探险家们利用他们的自然知识和生存技能走遍了世界的每一个角落。

Live to Tell the Tale.name: 活着才能讲故事 Live to Tell the Tale
Live to Tell the Tale.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 传记作家@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying}；

效果 传记作家的濒死（dying）状态值减少1。如果传记作家不再濒死，他们依然会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}至少一小时，或直到他重新恢复到1点HP。

Scroll Mastery.name: 卷轴精通 Scroll Mastery
Scroll Mastery.description: 传记作家能启动任意2环或更低环级的卷轴，就如同他的已知法术列表里有该法术，并且无视法术根源限制。

Commoner.name: 平民 Commoner
Commoner.publicNotes:
虽然不是每个平民都受到压迫，但它们中的很多人都过着艰苦的生活，只为了家人的吃住条件能相对舒适。虽然很多平民都是沉默的普通人，但是有时他们会奋起反抗，要么站起来面对压迫者，要么说服甚至被骗加入邪恶的计划和犯罪阴谋。平民团结起来就能拥有力量，一群平民能做到的事情有时远超他们统治者的想像。

不幸的是，每个社会都有生活在底层的人。虽然好的社区会为底层人民提供帮助，但是有时——由于经济衰退、饥荒或战争——社会无力负担这些不幸的人。在无情的中立或邪恶的社会中，贫穷是一种不可避免的现象，永远无法真正根除，而更糟糕的情况是，贫穷被当做一种被操纵用来获取整治利益的工具。

Power of the Mob.name: 暴民的力量 Power of the Mob
Power of the Mob.description: 当三个或更多平民相邻时，每个平民在进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}所需的运动检定、攻击检定和伤害检定上都获得+1环境加值。

Cult Leader.name: Cult Leader
Cult Leader.publicNotes:
A career of mystical accomplishments combined with a lifetime of subterfuge and intimidation has elevated this occultist to a powerful position.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Protect the Master!.name: Protect the Master!
Protect the Master!.description:
触发 The cult leader is targeted with an attack, and a lower-ranking cultist is adjacent to them

效果 The cult leader orders their cultist to leap in front of the attack. The cultist and cult leader swap places, and the cultist becomes the target of the attack. If the cultist has Fanatical Frenzy or a similar ability, they can activate it as a reaction if they take damage from the triggering attack.

Gather Converts.name: Gather Converts
Gather Converts.description:
With a short emotional phrase, the cult leader tries to sway the public to do their bidding. The cult leader tries to convince up to four bystanders in a crowd to either cause a commotion, turn against a person or group, leave the area, protect the cult leader, or calm down.

The cult leader attempts a single Deception check against the highest Perception DC among the targets.

Critical Success The targets believe the lie and act as directed for 1 minute. Additionally, one bystander remains by the cult leader's side, influenced enough to join their sect.

All other targets become wise to the cult leader after 1 minute, at which point their attitude toward the leader worsens by one step.

Success As a critical success, but no bystander joins the sect permanently.

Critical Failure The crowd is unmoved and unamused, and their attitude toward the cult leader worsens by one step.

Cultist.name: Cultist
Cultist.publicNotes:
Excessively zealous, a cultist finds exalted purpose in their sect. Never questioning their leader, they devote themselves to achieving their most perfect spiritual form.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

-2 to Will Saves vs. Higher Ranking Cult.name: 对抗邪教更高级别成员时意志豁免-2减值

Fanatical Frenzy.name: Fanatical Frenzy
Fanatical Frenzy.description:
需求 The cultist has taken damage and is neither @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} nor already in a frenzy

效果 The cultist flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the cultist gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and they take a -2 status penalty to AC. The cultist can't voluntarily stop their frenzy. After their frenzy, the cultist is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.3Wtzyb0ZgkaC7vHY]{效果: Fanatical Frenzy}

Dancer.name: Dancer
Dancer.publicNotes:
Dance can be used to tell stories, share emotions, provide entertainment, and display a performer's athletic ability. The dancer is a 5th-level challenge for dance contests.

Performances can serve as entertainment, expressions of beauty, or part of a shared culture.

Fascinating Dance.name: Fascinating Dance
Fascinating Dance.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The dancer Strides up to their Speed. Once during this movement, when the dancer is adjacent to a creature, the dancer can make that creature attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save. On a failure, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with the dancer until the end of its next turn.

Demonologist.name: Demonologist
Demonologist.publicNotes:
Demonologists can pull a creature from the Abyss and bend it to their will... for a time.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Abyssal Temptation.name: Abyssal Temptation
Abyssal Temptation.description:
Demonic study has garnered the attention of at least one demon that is actively trying to possess the demonologist.

When the demonologist publicly espouses the benefits of demonic power (whether they believe it a good thing or not), they gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks, AC, and saves for 1 day. These bonuses don't apply against demons.

At the end of the day, the demonologist must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save, becoming possessed for 1 day on a failure (permanently on a critical failure).

Breach the Abyss.name: Breach the Abyss
Breach the Abyss.description:
需求 The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell

效果 The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6 damage}.

Roll [[/r {1d20} type]] to determine the type:

  • 1-7 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.v1oNhc9xa8nWxmFQ]{效果: Breach the Abyss - Acid}
  • 8-9 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.vGL5LlFxVJqjy1gM]{效果: Breach the Abyss - Cold}
  • 10-11 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.vKTvlFD2OSgTPuvl]{效果: Breach the Abyss - Electricity}
  • 12-18 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.HGP0c0tOK2WnC4p5]{效果: Breach the Abyss - Fire}
  • 19-20 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Vz9Cb8FEzNwfH3mE]{效果: Breach the Abyss - Negative}

Demon Summoning.name: Demon Summoning
Demon Summoning.description:
The demonologist can cast a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.29ytKctjg7qSW2ff]{Summon Fiend} arcane spell to summon a demon. To do so, they must sacrifice two 4th-level prepared spells and voluntarily take [[/r {4d12}[mental]]]{4d12 mental damage} that can't be reduced or prevented.

If the demonologist is unable to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain} the Spell, including if they're knocked out or killed, the spell continues, but the GM rolls a @Check[type:flat|dc:10] each round, ending the spell on a failure.

Despot.name: Despot
Despot.publicNotes:
Despots live to amass and exploit power over others.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Persistent Lies.name: Persistent Lies
Persistent Lies.description: Any creature deceived by the despot's Deception skill believes the deception more readily on the next day. Any attempts to later attempt a Perception check against the despot's Deception DC take a -2 circumstance penalty, as do other creatures' attempts to convince the creature otherwise, such as through Diplomacy or further Deception.

Bloodline Magic.name: Bloodline Magic
Bloodline Magic.description:
When the despot casts a bloodline spell, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ZdHjnpEQJuqOYSG]{Flaming Sphere}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, either a target takes [[/r {1}[fire]]]{1 fire damage} per spell level, or the despot gains a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.tvybMInVm415jA3p]{效果: Bloodline Magic}

Dangerous Sorcery.name: Dangerous Sorcery
Dangerous Sorcery.description: When the despot @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Casts a Spell} from a spell slot, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, the despot gains a status bonus equal to the spell's level to that spell's damage.

Dockhand.name: Dockhand
Dockhand.publicNotes:
Working to load and unload cargo from ships, dockhands are considered unruly, but many stay focused and work hard until the job is done. Some do celebrate the end of their work day with rowdy drinking.

Every day, laborers perform backbreaking physical work.

Heft Crate.name: Heft Crate
Heft Crate.description:
需求 The dockhand is adjacent to a crate

效果 The dockhand picks up a crate and heaves it up to 15 feet. Upon landing, the crate breaks open in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5]. Each creature within the area takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|basic:true] save), and the area becomes difficult terrain until cleared.

Swig.name: Swig
Swig.description:
The dockhand Interacts to either draw a bottle of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.UMAXLDpI6YLSfYX1]{Alcohol} or pick up a nearby unattended bottle of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.UMAXLDpI6YLSfYX1]{Alcohol} and drink the whole thing.

For 1 minute, the dockhand gains a +2 item bonus to melee damage rolls and saving throws against fear, but they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.HArljmKc2IR7rtfc]{效果: Swig}

Drunkard.name: Drunkard
Drunkard.publicNotes:
Every tavern has one-that person who drinks a little too much and starts a fight. While many drunkards are relatively harmless, a few have a hair trigger, and when they're set off come, no one-even the drunkard themself-can tell you what started the row.

Countless adventures begin in a tavern or a pub. Maybe it's because such places attract the risk-prone, or maybe it's because everyone needs a little liquid courage before they decide to take on a group of rampaging ogres.

Drunken Rage.name: Drunken Rage
Drunken Rage.description:
需求 The drunkard is drunk, and isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

效果 Something sets the drunkard off, causing them to fly into a drunken rage. They gain 6 temporary Hit Points that last until the drunken rage ends. While raging, they deal 4 additional damage with melee attacks and take a -1 penalty to AC. The drunkard can't use concentrate actions except @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} and rage actions.

The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the drunkard falls unconscious or sobers up. The drunkard can't voluntarily stop the Drunken Rage. Once the rage ends, the drunkard can't Rage again for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{效果: Rage}

Force Body.name: Force Body
Force Body.description: An ethereal sailor's body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use actions necessary to pilot or crew a boat or ship. It can't leave its boat or ship.

Executioner.name: Executioner
Executioner.publicNotes:
Executioners carry out sentences from cruel tyrants and legitimate rulers alike. Most remain numb to the necessity of their duty, but some evil executioners grow to love the power of having someone else's life in their hands.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Behead.name: Behead
Behead.description:
需求 The executioner is adjacent to a dying creature or a creature specifically prepared for a killing blow

效果 The executioner Strikes the creature with their greataxe. On a hit, in addition to taking damage, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save or be reduced to 0 HP and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying 1}. If the creature was already dying (including if it was reduced to 0 HP by the Strike's damage), the creature's dying value increases by 1, in addition to any increase from the Strike. On a critical failure, the creature dies instantly.

If the executioner's Strike was a critical hit, the target uses the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw.

Intimidating Strike.name: Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: The executioner makes a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical hit.

Mark for Death.name: Mark for Death
Mark for Death.description:
The executioner marks a single creature they can see for death. The first time each round the executioner Strikes that creature, the Strike deals [[/r {1d12}[precision]]]{1d12 additional精准伤害}.

The creature remains marked for death until the executioner is knocked out, marks a different creature for death, or the encounter ends.

False Priest.name: False Priest
False Priest.publicNotes:
Belief is perhaps the strongest force in the universe, driving many to great heights. Instilling a sense of belief and then using that belief against someone, however, is the discipline of a false priest. Combining their gifts of deception, a silver tongue, and an impeccable sense of timing, the false priest can gain influence among the powerful, entice a mark to dispose of all their possessions, and make a believer out of a cynic.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Deceiver's Surprise.name: Deceiver's Surprise
Deceiver's Surprise.description: On the first round of combat, if the false priest rolls Deception or Performance for initiative, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the false priest.

Fickle Prophecy.name: Fickle Prophecy
Fickle Prophecy.description:
The false priest convinces someone of their omnipotence by attempting a Deception check compared to the creature's Will DC.

If successful, the target gains [[/r 1d8+4 #Temporary Hit Points]]{1d8+4 temporary Hit Points} that last for 1 hour or until the false priest removes them by rebuking the target, whichever occurs first.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The false priest deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. This increases to [[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6精准伤害} against creatures flat-footed due to the false priest's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint} or deceiver's surprise.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

The Jig Is Up.name: The Jig Is Up
The Jig Is Up.description:
频率 once per hour

触发 The false priest critically fails a Deception or Performance check

效果 The false priest Strides.

Farmer.name: Farmer
Farmer.publicNotes:
Workers of the fields, vineyards, and orchards of the world, farmers are known for their rugged endurance and their skill with both plants and animals.

Every day, laborers perform backbreaking physical work.

Pitch Bale.name: Pitch Bale
Pitch Bale.description:
需求 The farmer's last action was a successful pitchfork Strike

效果 The farmer moves the creature they hit with their pitchfork up to 5 feet, and the target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. The target can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:13] save to avoid falling prone, and avoids being moved altogether on a critical success.

Fence.name: 销赃人 Fence
Fence.publicNotes:
罪犯持有赃物的时间越长，他们被抓的机会就越大。销赃人在黑街中不可或缺，通过购买赃物，然后再通过一个看似合法的生意或固定的买家来转手。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

Fence's Eye.name: 销赃人之眼 Fence's Eye
Fence's Eye.description: 销赃人靠他们进行地下交易的能力吃饭。他们可以使用黑街学识来进行估价，并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{辨识魔法 Identify Magic}。当他们这样做时，他们的黑街学识检定有+2环境加值。并且他们可以用黑街学识来判断一个物品是否属于赃物，该赃物是否容易转移，以及什么样的买家会对这件赃物感兴趣。

Quick Rummage.name: 快速翻找 Quick Rummage
Quick Rummage.description: 销赃人手边总有一些能用得上的物品。销赃人以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interacts}动作拔出一把武器或能用一个动作启动的物品，然后用该武器进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes}或启动该物品。

Scoundrel's Feint.name: 卑鄙虚招 Scoundrel's Feint
Scoundrel's Feint.description: 当销赃人成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feints}时，目标直到销赃人的下个回合结束，都对销赃人@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。如果虚招大成功，则目标直到销赃人的下个回合结束，对所有敌人都@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
销赃人对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Gang Leader.name: Gang Leader
Gang Leader.publicNotes:
Cutthroats, killers, thieves, and toughs prey upon the vulnerable of society. Directing their activities and keeping them in line are the duties of the gang leader.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: The gang leader isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to creatures of 7th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}, flanking, or using surprise attack.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When the gang leader rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 The gang leader is targeted with an attack by an attacker they can see

效果 The gang leader gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if the gang leader rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures who haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the gang leader.

Brutal Rally.name: Brutal Rally
Brutal Rally.description:
触发 The gang leader rolls a critical hit against a creature

效果 All allies that can see the gang leader gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls until the start of the gang leader's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.7x0O2GqWBJiAk5PF]{效果: Brutal Rally}

Gang Up.name: Gang Up
Gang Up.description: Any enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the gang leader's melee attacks due to flanking as long as the enemy is within melee reach of both the gang leader and one of the gang leader's allies.

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: The gang leader @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interacts} to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The gang leader deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Grave Robber.name: 盗墓贼 Grave Robber
Grave Robber.publicNotes:
在许多文化中，人们都有选择将最珍贵的财产陪葬的传统习俗，有些文化中甚至还认为这是给来世带来恩惠的礼物。这些贵重物品对于那些对死亡毫无敬畏之心的人来说真是唾手可得。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

wOWNuciIMk1EpXis.name: 圣水 Holy Water
wOWNuciIMk1EpXis.description:
仅能伤害魔族、不死生物和拥有善良伤害弱点的生物

[[/r {1}[good]]]{1善良溅射伤害}

Infused Items.name: 灌注物品 Infused Items
Infused Items.description:
盗墓贼携带以下灌注物品：2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.AFR01HVd7DcZvkpP]{次等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Lesser)}，1瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{次等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Lesser)}，和1个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Xnqglykl3Cif8rN9]{次等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Lesser)}。

这些物品持续24小时，或直到盗墓贼进行每日准备时消失。

Gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
Gravedigger.publicNotes:
An often-overlooked group of laborers, gravediggers have a reputation for being as quiet and grim as their workplace. They are commonly strong and tough from their long hours of backbreaking labor, and they tend to have a unique perspective on life and death.

Every day, laborers perform backbreaking physical work.

Light in the Dark.name: Light in the Dark
Light in the Dark.description:
需求 The gravedigger holds a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QrNvP9SgnK9DrerA]{Lantern (Bull's Eye)} in one hand and their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.plplsXJsqrdqNQVI]{Religious Symbol} in the other, and the lantern contains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Du05UxCyCM0ZWH8z]{Oil}

效果 The gravedigger recites a brief chant to ignite their lantern with positive energy. Each undead creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:15] takes [[/r {3d6}[positive]]]{3d6 positive damage} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:14|basic:true] save). This action uses all remaining @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Du05UxCyCM0ZWH8z]{Oil} in the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QrNvP9SgnK9DrerA]{Lantern (Bull's Eye)}.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.publicNotes:
Guards are rank-and-file members of a town watch or city guard, trained to look for trouble, take down criminals, and follow orders. They are a match for only the most fledgling of adventurers and criminals, but, given time, the settlement can usually muster them in numbers sufficient to neutralize most threats.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Guide.name: 向导 Guide
Guide.publicNotes:
向导们带领旅行者、游客和冒险者进入奇妙的自然世界，用他们的专业知识来规避致命的怪物及可怕的危险。

世界是广阔而充满危险的。探险家们利用他们的自然知识和生存技能走遍了世界的每一个角落。

Guide's Warning.name: 向导的警告 Guide's Warning
Guide's Warning.description:
触发 向导即将以察觉或生存技能进行先攻检定；

效果 向导采取可看见或可听见的方式警告盟友，让他们的先攻检定获得+1环境加值。根据向导选择的行动，此动作带有视觉或听觉特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.UiISDbCjK6AUDsll]{效果: 向导的警告}

Guiding Words.name: 引导之语 Guiding Words
Guiding Words.description:
向导指出30尺内的一个生物的弱点。

向导和所有能听到或能看到该生物的盟友在对该生物的攻击检定和伤害检定上获得+1状态加值，持续到向导下一回合开始。在持续时间内，对该生物的武器和非武装攻击增加额外1d6点精准伤害。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.uqjx1bwYduHwwC7d]{效果: 引导之语}

Guildmaster.name: Guildmaster
Guildmaster.publicNotes:
In cities, artisans working in a common trade often form guilds to set standards of quality, establish common prices, engage in collective bargaining with business owners, and lobby local governments for favorable laws. The guildmaster-often a master artisan in their own right-also acts as an administrator and politician, advocating for artisans in their trade. The guildmaster is a 12th-level challenge when competing in crafting or their area of expertise (architecture in the example below).

Every settlement needs tradespeople to create new products, facilitate commerce, and keep the infrastructure from crumbling. Larger cities often have entire guilds dedicated to the creation of specific goods, managing worker conditions, and working with local governments.

Call to Action.name: Call to Action
Call to Action.description:
The guildmaster gives a speech to inspire themself and all guild-member allies within 60 feet, granting them a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls until the start of the guildmaster's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.kdZEZ6iBYQPVGzYD]{效果: Call to Action}

Sworn Duty.name: Sworn Duty
Sworn Duty.description: While within the guild or presiding over guild business, the guildmaster gains a +2 circumstance bonus to weapon attack rolls and deals an additional [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6 damage} on a successful weapon attack.

Harbormaster.name: Harbormaster
Harbormaster.publicNotes:
There are three flows important to any port: the seaward and coastal flows, marked by the rise and fall of the tides, and the flow of trade. A harbormaster is expected to know the former two reflexively and encourage the latter while knowing jurisdictional rules of law. Often old hands of the sea, harbormasters find themselves anchored to a port by commitment, conflict, or reputation.

Magistrates are the cogs and gears that keep bureaucracy running, moving the machine along under the inertia of the status quo.

Steady Balance.name: Steady Balance
Steady Balance.description:
Whenever the harbormaster rolls a success on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance}, they get a critical success instead. They're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balancing} on narrow surfaces and uneven ground.

They can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}.

Experienced Hand.name: Experienced Hand
Experienced Hand.description: The harbormaster has endured their share of adverse conditions at sea. Any creature that's in adverse weather or aboard a vessel on rough water is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the harbormaster.

Harrow Reader.name: Harrow Reader
Harrow Reader.publicNotes:
A harrow deck is a set of 54 cards with symbolic illustrations that serves as a sacred divining tool. Feared by the superstitious and avoided by those who know better than to tempt fate, harrow readers live and work in traveling communities, often moving from town to town as opportunities arise. For encounters involving social interaction, the harrow reader is a 3rd-level challenge.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Fated Doom.name: Fated Doom
Fated Doom.description: While harrow readers try to avoid combat, no throw of the cards can avoid fate, so a harrow reader learns how to best survive. In the harrow reader's first encounter each day, they gain a +1 status bonus to their initiative roll, their attack rolls, and their AC.

Hellknight Armiger.name: 地狱骑士扈从 Hellknight Armiger
Hellknight Armiger.publicNotes:
这个矮人穿着一副装饰着地狱骑士团纹章的盔甲，挥舞着一把威猛的连枷。

扈从是地狱骑士团的步兵，是大多数骑士团中人数最多的成员。无论他们加入地狱骑士团的目的是什么，这些武装人员都和地狱骑士们一样，致力于在格拉里昂推行法制。这种义务给他们带来了各种各样的任务，无论是铲除匪徒和恶棍，拘捕走私者和黑市商人，还是调查有人煽动叛乱的传言。虽然边境居民有时对地狱骑士带来的安全保障非常欢迎，但是自由主义者和历史学家们会对地狱骑士扈从们限制人们行动和言论自由的行为感到愤怒。

虽然扈从还未成为骑士，但那些低估他们的人会意识到自己犯了严重的错误。一旦接到占领阵地或消灭敌人的命令，扈从们能坚定不移地执行。在战斗中他们会急切地加入战斗，把混乱之神的信徒或使用卑鄙战术的小人作为首要目标。

地狱骑士是不惜一切代价执行法律的坚定信徒，他们通常驻扎在切利亚斯，但也会前往格拉里昂各地强行推行他们理想中的秩序。这种僵化的信条和对异教徒的零容忍意味着PC可以很容易这些地狱骑士中遭遇对手，当然也能找到盟友。一个锁链骑士团的成员可能会帮助PC们镇压邪恶和暴力的罪犯，也可能会追捕那些轻微违反法律的PC们。下文描述的“地狱骑士扈从”可能是一个试图镇压反抗压迫的暴民的执法者，或是一个专注于狩猎的怪物猎人，或是一个对艺术创新进行审查的审查官，或是一个解救绑架者的救世主，或是一个折磨间谍的拷问者，或是对抗恶魔入侵的十字军。而后面列出的“地狱骑士副持书官”则绝对是其信条的典范，与他们遭遇的PC将会发现自己正身处在某个大事件之中。
Hellknight Armiger.tokenName: 地狱骑士扈从 Hellknight Armiger

+1 status to all saves vs. fear.name: 对抗恐惧效果全豁免+1状态加值

Weapon Mastery.name: 武器专精 Weapon Mastery
Weapon Mastery.description: 当地狱骑士扈从以战用连枷造成重击时，目标被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Hellknight Paravicar.name: 地狱骑士副持书官 Hellknight Paravicar
Hellknight Paravicar.publicNotes:
此人头戴威风凛凛的头盔，身上裹着华丽的铠甲，浑身散发出一种无可动摇的权威。

每个地狱骑士团的子团都有一名强大的副持书官（paravicar）领导，他负责骑士团的战术指挥和资源管理。在骑士团中，这些人物的一言一行就是法则，从低级侍从到高级骑士，都坚定不移地服从副持书官的命令。副持书官将自身对于教令的奉献作为所有成员的榜样，并要求他们的下属和他们保持同样严格的自我约束。虽然很少有局面需要他们出场，但他们利用强大的地狱力量来巩固他们在地狱骑士阶级中的地位。

在战斗中，副持书官直接指挥骑士和扈从。副持书官战斗经验丰富，他们更喜欢以智取胜，而不是鲁莽行事，更不会让部队暴露在危险之中。如果被迫参与战斗，副持书官会利用他们的能力来挫败敌人的士气，迫使敌人成为他们的盟友或逃离战场。

地狱骑士是不惜一切代价执行法律的坚定信徒，他们通常驻扎在切利亚斯，但也会前往格拉里昂各地强行推行他们理想中的秩序。这种僵化的信条和对异教徒的零容忍意味着PC可以很容易这些地狱骑士中遭遇对手，当然也能找到盟友。一个锁链骑士团的成员可能会帮助PC们镇压邪恶和暴力的罪犯，也可能会追捕那些轻微违反法律的PC们。下文描述的“地狱骑士扈从”可能是一个试图镇压反抗压迫的暴民的执法者，或是一个专注于狩猎的怪物猎人，或是一个对艺术创新进行审查的审查官，或是一个解救绑架者的救世主，或是一个折磨间谍的拷问者，或是对抗恶魔入侵的十字军。而后面列出的“地狱骑士副持书官”则绝对是其信条的典范，与他们遭遇的PC将会发现自己正身处在某个大事件之中。
Hellknight Paravicar.tokenName: 地狱骑士副持书官 Hellknight Paravicar

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 如果一个反应动作将要打断地狱骑士副持书官的施法，他们可以尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:15]检定。一旦成功，则施法动作不会被打断。

Universal Obedience.name: 普遍服从 Universal Obedience
Universal Obedience.description: 如果地狱骑士副持书官的下一个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放 Cast a sorcerer Spell}带有语言特征的术士法术，该法术影响目标就如同目标和地狱骑士副持书官和拥有共通语言。目标必须拥有至少一种语言。

Hunter.name: 猎人 Hunter
Hunter.publicNotes:
正如同许多关于鹿头神埃拉斯蒂尔（Erastil）的描述所反映的那样：猎人是森林众多生物钟的一员，熟悉森林的方方面面。毕竟，谁是猎人、谁是猎物往往取决于谁能更有效地利用地形优势。

从村庄掌管和耕种的树林，到只有贵族和他们的仆人们才被允许狩猎的皇家猎场，森林为社区提供了燃料、食物、药材和其他原材料，而皇家保护的森林为贵族们的餐桌提供了食物，并且为组织狩猎这一娱乐活动提供了场地。即使是未被凡人的双手和利刃触及的原始森林，也为诗人的传说提供了故事舞台。许多人觉得森林深处让人不安，但是也有一些人生活在树木的包围中，与那些以森林为家的生物一同生活。

Forager.name: 采集者 Forager
Forager.description: 每当猎人使用生存技能进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{求生 Subsist}动作时，如果检定结果低于成功，则自动获得成功结果。如果猎人在求生时获得了成功，你可以为自己加上另外16个生物提供足以维生程度的饮食和住所；如果大成功，则提升为32个生物。

Forest Walker.name: 森林行者 Forest Walker
Forest Walker.description: 猎人无视森林环境产生的困难地形效果。他们在灌木丛里@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}时，如果猎人移动不超过5尺，并且在此行动中的任何一点的10尺内都没有敌人，则不需要进行隐秘检定。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
猎人指定一只他们能看到和听到的动物，或他们正在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}的动物，作为他们的猎杀目标。

猎人在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}时的察觉检定和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}时的生存检定获得+2加值。

猎人每轮第一次击中猎杀目标时额外造成[[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害}。猎人在对抗猎杀目标时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

此效果持续到猎人再次指定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}。

Innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
Innkeeper.publicNotes:
The sight of an inn is a welcome one to any weary traveler. Innkeepers can often be found cleaning the common room, overseeing the evening meal, or settling in new lodgers. Innkeepers keep an eye on their neighbors' doings and are often excellent sources of information.

Countless adventures begin in a tavern or a pub. Maybe it's because such places attract the risk-prone, or maybe it's because everyone needs a little liquid courage before they decide to take on a group of rampaging ogres.

Font of Gossip.name: Font of Gossip
Font of Gossip.description:
The inkeeper's business gives them insight into the neighborhood's happenings. When @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gathering Information}, a person can gain as much information chatting with the innkeeper for 30 minutes to an hour as they would gain from 2 hours spent canvassing the neighborhood. Each person can learn gossip from an innkeeper only once per day, and only if the innkeeper is friendly or helpful to that individual.

Whatever information the innkeeper knows about a given topic doesn't change if someone else asks the innkeeper about that topic, unless the innkeeper has since learned more.

Home Turf.name: Home Turf
Home Turf.description: An innkeeper gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and AC within their inn.

Jailer.name: Jailer
Jailer.publicNotes:
A jailer's primary responsibility is to keep prisoners from escaping. Jailers must often use force, or the threat of force, to keep their charges in line, as even the most carefully crafted cells, manacles, or chains can fail with time and persistence when the prisoners have the will to attempt an escape.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Efficient Capture.name: Efficient Capture
Efficient Capture.description:
需求 The jailer has manacles in hand and is adjacent to a creature

效果 The jailer attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the jailer succeeds at an attack roll with a [[/r 1d20+9 #Manacles]]{+9 modifier} against the target's AC, they apply the manacles.

Intimidating Strike.name: Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: The jailer makes a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical hit.

Subdue Prisoners.name: Subdue Prisoners
Subdue Prisoners.description: The jailer doesn't take the normal penalty for making a nonlethal attack when attacking with their club.

Judge.name: Judge
Judge.publicNotes:
These magistrates have the final say on the intent and spirit of the law. Properly exercised, the duty of a judge is the strict adherence to the law regardless of station, with minimal sentimentality toward rationalization and justification of why the law was broken. Yet expectations and practice are not always the same thing. For every unbiased justice, there is one who is zealously confident in their own agenda. In a court case or other legal proceeding, the judge is a 6th-level challenge.

Magistrates are the cogs and gears that keep bureaucracy running, moving the machine along under the inertia of the status quo.

Group Impression.name: Group Impression
Group Impression.description: When the judge @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}, they can compare their Diplomacy check result to the Will DCs of up to four targets instead of one.

Librarian.name: Librarian
Librarian.publicNotes:
Keepers of knowledge, librarians document discoveries, events, and laws. The best librarians record events twice; once for public record, and again to record how events truly unfolded. A librarian typically knows four to six additional languages, often including Elven and Draconic. A librarian is a 3rd-level challenge for encounters involving research.

True power comes from knowledge: the power to shape the growth of kingdoms by mere whispers, staying three steps ahead of adversaries, or even knowing which flora is best for creating untraceable poisons.

Methodical Research.name: Methodical Research
Methodical Research.description:
When @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching} through stacks of books, a librarian can find the answer to almost any question. This allows the librarian to use Library Lore in place of other lore skills, given enough time.

The GM determines the DC of the check and the amount of time it takes (typically, a librarian can attempt three or four checks during 1 day of downtime).

Mage For Hire.name: Mage For Hire
Mage For Hire.publicNotes:
Not all mercenaries sell brawn and intimidating glares. Some sell their magical talents to earn a living. While there are many types of mages for hire, some of the sneakiest are specialized in divination, using their skills for infiltration and sabotage.

A broad category that includes those wielding arms, spells, or even guile and cunning, mercenaries hire themselves and their expertise to those with the gold to pay for it.

Mastermind.name: Mastermind
Mastermind.publicNotes:
Masterminds weave long-ranged plots to see their nefarious goals come to fruition, deftly manipulating those around them, and turning enemies into friends and then pitting them against one another. When competing in a social or intellectual arena, the mastermind is a 7th-level challenge.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Versatile Performance.name: Versatile Performance
Versatile Performance.description:
The mastermind can use Performance instead of Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} and instead of Intimidation to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}.

The mastermind can also use an acting Performance instead of Deception to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate}.

Scoundrel's Feint.name: Scoundrel's Feint
Scoundrel's Feint.description: When the mastermind successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feints}, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the mastermind's melee attacks until the end of the mastermind's next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all melee attacks for that time, not just the mastermind's.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The mastermind deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Merchant.name: Merchant
Merchant.publicNotes:
Small settlements can typically support one or two generalist merchants, and larger cities house multiple specialists-experts in one type of product. Merchants can be found anywhere: vendors hustling in the public square, shopkeepers running small storefronts, traveling salespeople in carriages or caravans, or wealthy tycoons running entire organizations devoted to commerce. For encounters involving negotiation or mercantile skill, a merchant is a 4th-level challenge. A merchant might have an additional Lore skill about a specific category of item (such as jewelry or magic weapons), with a total skill bonus 2 higher than Mercantile Lore.

Every settlement needs tradespeople to create new products, facilitate commerce, and keep the infrastructure from crumbling. Larger cities often have entire guilds dedicated to the creation of specific goods, managing worker conditions, and working with local governments.

Appraising Eye.name: Appraising Eye
Appraising Eye.description: The merchant can use Mercantile Lore to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} about items, including determining their value. They can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{辨识魔法 Identify Magic} using Mercantile Lore and can do so without first knowing whether the item is magical.

Miner.name: Miner
Miner.publicNotes:
Miners explore deep underground in search of minerals and rare materials, taking numerous precautions to keep themselves safe.

Every day, laborers perform backbreaking physical work.

Piton Pin.name: Piton Pin
Piton Pin.description:
需求 The miner has their hammer in hand

效果 The miner Interacts to draw a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oX39xqMLVB8kNrY0]{Piton}, then hammers it into a creature to pin them in place, attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it removes the piton with a successful @Check[type:athletics|dc:10|name:Remove Piton] check made as an Interact action.

Monster Hunter.name: Monster Hunter
Monster Hunter.publicNotes:
Some mercenaries eschew the complications of politics, oaths of service, and fealty and just get paid to hunt monsters. It's a straightforward form of mercenary service, often dangerous in the extreme, but one that can yield glory and fame.

A broad category that includes those wielding arms, spells, or even guile and cunning, mercenaries hire themselves and their expertise to those with the gold to pay for it.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description:
需求 The monster hunter isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

效果 The monster hunter gains 9 temporary Hit Points that last until the rage ends. While raging, they deal 8 additional damage with melee attacks, gain a +10-foot status bonus to their Speed, and take a -1 penalty to AC. The monster hunter can't use concentrate actions except @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} and rage actions.

The rage lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies the monster hunter can perceive, or until the monster hunter falls unconscious.

Once the rage ends, the monster hunter can't again for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{效果: Rage}

Sudden Charge.name: Sudden Charge
Sudden Charge.description: The monster hunter Strides twice and makes a melee Strike.

Navigator.name: Navigator
Navigator.publicNotes:
A navigator uses celestial bodies and shipping lanes to determine routes. For noncombat tasks involving navigation or sailing, the navigator is a 4th-level challenge.

Adventurers may need passage on a swift vessel, or they might face danger from raiders at sea or in coastal settlements.

Chart a Course.name: Chart a Course
Chart a Course.description:
By spending 10 minutes of work and succeeding at a @Check[type:sailing-lore|dc:22]{Sailing Lore} check, the navigator plots an optimal course.

The severity of environmental conditions other than temperature are reduced by one step for 24 hours (two steps on a critical success). This changes moderate damage to minor damage, winds that create greater difficult terrain cause only difficult terrain, and so on.

Navigator's Edge.name: Navigator's Edge
Navigator's Edge.description: The navigator deals an additional [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 weapon damage} when on a ship.

Necromancer.name: Necromancer
Necromancer.publicNotes:
Defiling the natural order and spitting in the face of convention, the necromancer remains dutifully committed to understanding what forces await beyond the mortal boundaries of life and death.

Those initiated into the hidden truths and forbidden secrets of the world are forever transformed-or so they claim. To the cynical, a mystic is nothing more than a charlatan or zealot. Others profess to sense an aura around such luminaries and treat them with reverence, lest they offend some harbinger of unspeakable doom.

Stench of Decay.name: Stench of Decay
Stench of Decay.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The necromancer emits a scent of putrid rot in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 The necromancer expends the power stored in their mace. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

Noble.name: 贵族 Noble
Noble.publicNotes:
许多人羡慕贵族，还有些人憎恶贵族，贵族散发着自信和文雅。八卦和赌博通常是贵族们最爱的消遣。贵族的日常生活通常结合了商业活动和社交休闲，而对外人来说，这样的生活可能只是一连串的宴席、聚会和游戏。然而，另一些人则相信贵族生活通常是相当危险的，而且需要比表面上看起来更多的智慧——以及对健康状况的怀疑。

虽然冒险家们穿过黑暗的地牢，跨过危险的荒野，但有时候对他们来说最险象环生的地方其实是贵族宫廷。

Lip Reader.name: 读唇者 Lip Reader
Lip Reader.description: 贵族在刺探情报方面经过长年累月的的努力之后掌握了读唇的方法，获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{读唇 Read Lips}专长的效果。

Noble's Ruse.name: 贵族诡谋 Noble's Ruse
Noble's Ruse.description:
频率: 每轮一次

效果: 贵族进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.RjfPFjqPrNve6eeh]{虚招 Feints}，一旦成功，贵族对目标进行一次打击。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
贵族对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Palace Guard.name: 宫殿守卫 Palace Guard
Palace Guard.publicNotes:
每座宫殿都有守卫。他们通常由贵族的年轻后代，或者是由王公的亲信们组成的长长的仪仗，负责保卫皇家和其宫殿内部的堡垒。他们的工作包括守卫门道、护送贵族到不同的地点，以及尽可能保障贵族们的安全。下面的数据是一个小国宫廷卫队的最低级士兵，他们也同样适用于次级贵族的精英卫队。

虽然冒险家们穿过黑暗的地牢，跨过危险的荒野，但有时候对他们来说最险象环生的地方其实是贵族宫廷。

Royal Defender.name: 皇家防御者 Royal Defender
Royal Defender.description: 忠诚的宫殿守卫在保护其君主时，攻击检定获得+2环境加值。

Pathfinder Field Agent.name: 探索者外勤特工 Pathfinder Field Agent
Pathfinder Field Agent.publicNotes:
这个半精灵女性打扮得好像要去任何地方旅行，并为一路上可能遇到的任何不测做好了准备。

没有哪两位探索者加入协会的方式完全相同，也没有哪两位探索者的探索之路完全一致。协会的危险任务需要各种类型的冒险者，从经验丰富的战士到废墟研究者和神秘学专家。一些外勤探员是高度专业化的，在更广大的探索者群体中只扮演单一的角色，而另一些则是多面手。

这位外勤探员寻求从内海诸多古代遗迹中发现失落宝藏的刺激。她在前方为队伍做侦查，留意敌人陷阱和其他危险。在战斗中，她很谨慎，也很务实，喜欢保持移动和隐蔽。当有把握赢得战斗时，她会偷偷发起最后一击。

探索者协会是一个寻求学习和与他人分享其知识的具有影响力的大型组织，其成员甚至可以在最不可能的地方出现。作为探索者协会成员的PC通常会陪同一名探索者外勤探员，或从冒险队长那里获得新闻和任务。
Pathfinder Field Agent.tokenName: 探索者外勤特工 Pathfinder Field Agent

Scout's Warning.name: 斥候警戒 Scout's Warning
Scout's Warning.description:
触发 外勤探员即将以察觉进行先攻；

效果 外勤探员通过听觉或视觉警告自己的盟友即将发生的危险。如果警告是声音，则此效果获得听觉特征，如果警告是可见的，则此效果获得视觉特征。任何能看见或听见警告的盟友在先攻检定上获得+1环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.RxDDXK52lwyHXl7v]{效果: 斥候警戒}

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 外勤探员对在面对夹击的、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}的、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}的或是使用突然袭击能力的且等级不高于4级的生物时，不会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Mobility.name: 灵活移动 Mobility
Mobility.description: 当外勤探员以不超过半速行走时，改移动不会触发反应动作。

Surprise Attack.name: 突然袭击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 在战斗的第一轮，任何尚未行动的生物都会外勤探员@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Trap Finder.name: 寻找陷阱 Trap Finder
Trap Finder.description: 外勤探员依靠直觉提醒自己危险和陷阱的存在。他在寻找陷阱、对抗陷阱攻击的AC以及豁免上获得+1环境加值。即使你没有在进行搜索（Searching）行动，你依旧可以进行一次检定来找到通常需要进行搜索行动才能找到的陷阱。他可以解除贼活熟练度要求为大师的陷阱。

Pathfinder Venture-Captain.name: 探索者冒险队长 Pathfinder Venture-Captain
Pathfinder Venture-Captain.publicNotes:
这个矮人身上复满藤壶的装甲暗示了数不清的激动人心的传说。

探路者协会的冒险队长通过独特的道路在组织中不断晋升。每个冒险队长都克服了无数的挑战，每个挑战都有无数的故事可以讲述——以及伴随它们而来的伤疤。每个冒险队长都在内海的某个地方拥有一间安全屋，探路者可以在那里休息，分享故事，并开始新的任务。冒险队长分配这些任务，可以利用探索者协会的重要资源——以及任何当地盟友——来确保任务的成功。

这位冒险队长经营着一间安全屋，它同时也是一间小酒馆。他对史诗故事的兴趣促使他加入了开拓协会，他也很乐意与感兴趣的人分享这些故事。投机取巧的外勤探员可以通过回收独特而有价值的酒水来获得冒险队长的青睐。这位冒险队长希望有一天也能出版一本属于自己的《探索者编年史》。

探索者协会是一个寻求学习和与他人分享其知识的具有影响力的大型组织，其成员甚至可以在最不可能的地方出现。作为探索者协会成员的PC通常会陪同一名探索者外勤探员，或从冒险队长那里获得新闻和任务。
Pathfinder Venture-Captain.tokenName: 探索者冒险队长 Pathfinder Venture-Captain

Unshakable.name: 坚定不移 Unshakable
Unshakable.description: 每当冒险队长获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}状态时，减少状态值1点。

Bardic Lore.name: 逸闻学识 Bardic Lore
Bardic Lore.description: 冒险队长能用逸闻学识对任何子题@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}。

Paragon's Guard.name: 护卫典范 Paragon's Guard
Paragon's Guard.description: 当冒险队长在此架势中并且持握盾牌时，永远保持举盾。

Weapon Mastery (Hammer).name: 武器精通[战锤] Weapon Mastery (Hammer)
Weapon Mastery (Hammer).description: 冒险队长总是练习使用战锤。他使用的所有简易和军用战锤都获得重击专精效果。

Physician.name: Physician
Physician.publicNotes:
The art of medicine is a blend of the intellectual and the practical, concerned with how diseases work and how to prevent them. The physician can be found consulting well-thumbed tomes while meticulously examining patients to better understand their condition, before determining the most effective treatment. For medical matters, the physician is a 4th-level challenge.

The world is a dangerous place. Thankfully, there are those who devote their lives to easing the pain and suffering of others.

Bedside Manner.name: Bedside Manner
Bedside Manner.description: A physician has a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} on or make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} of a diseased, poisoned, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} creature.

Doctor's Hand.name: Doctor's Hand
Doctor's Hand.description: When the physician rolls a critical failure on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, they get a failure instead.

Pirate.name: Pirate
Pirate.publicNotes:
These scourges of the seas are a threat to anyone who spends time away from land.

Adventurers may need passage on a swift vessel, or they might face danger from raiders at sea or in coastal settlements.

Bravery.name: Bravery
Bravery.description: When the pirate rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

Boarding Action.name: Boarding Action
Boarding Action.description: The pirate swings on a rope or Strides, moving up to double their Speed. If the pirate boarded or disembarked a boat during this movement, they can make a melee Strike at the end of their movement that deals one extra damage die on a hit.
