Plague Doctor.name: Plague Doctor
Plague Doctor.publicNotes:
These healers, often seen wearing distinctive masks and burning powders to defend against airborne plagues, are as much feared as they are respected. To see a plague doctor signals that disease has infested the land-and that it might have already taken hold. Despite their devoted work in curing the untouchable, they are sometimes treated with suspicion, as if they are somehow the cause of the plague.

The world is a dangerous place. Thankfully, there are those who devote their lives to easing the pain and suffering of others.

Healing Hands.name: Healing Hands
Healing Hands.description: When the plague doctor casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}, they roll d10s instead of d8s.

Improved Communal Healing.name: Improved Communal Healing
Improved Communal Healing.description: When the plague doctor casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} targeting a single creature, the plague doctor also restores Hit Points equal to the spell's level to themself or any other creature within range of the spell.

Poacher.name: 偷猎者 Poacher
Poacher.publicNotes:
一些森林由国王保护，另一些则由荒野之灵守护。禁止狩猎的法律可以保护贵族的私人领地，或者在特定季节保护森林动物种群的生存。偷猎者违反了这些法律，有时候是出于贪婪，有时候是出于绝望，有时是为了娱乐。尽管对偷猎的惩罚常常包括公开的羞辱，但是在经济困难时期，成功的偷猎者反而是当地的英雄。

从村庄掌管和耕种的树林，到只有贵族和他们的仆人们才被允许狩猎的皇家猎场，森林为社区提供了燃料、食物、药材和其他原材料，而皇家保护的森林为贵族们的餐桌提供了食物，并且为组织狩猎这一娱乐活动提供了场地。即使是未被凡人的双手和利刃触及的原始森林，也为诗人的传说提供了故事舞台。许多人觉得森林深处让人不安，但是也有一些人生活在树木的包围中，与那些以森林为家的生物一同生活。

Forager.name: 采集者 Forager
Forager.description:
每当偷猎者使用生存技能进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{求生 Subsist}动作时，如果检定结果低于成功，则自动获得成功结果。

如果偷猎者在求生时获得了成功，你可以为自己加上另外4个生物提供足以维生程度的饮食和住所；如果大成功，则提升为8个生物。

Snare Crafting.name: 圈套制作 Snare Crafting
Snare Crafting.description:
偷猎者可以用手艺技能制造如下圈套：

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.AFX1V0Go9DqPWBlN]{警报圈套 Alarm Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Km4lSOsyrip5q6iD]{妨碍圈套 Hampering Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oplQpQSTyTvHDDtq]{标记圈套 Marking Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XcD8p1o71tPohZWT]{信号圈套 Signaling Snare}

偷猎者每天能制造4个圈套而不需要消耗材料，并且使用三个交互动作来设置每一个圈套。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
偷猎者指定一只他们能看到和听到的动物，或他们正在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}的动物，作为他们的猎杀目标。

偷猎者在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}时的察觉检定和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}时的生存检定获得+2加值。

偷猎者每轮第一次击中猎杀目标时额外造成[[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害}。偷猎者在对抗猎杀目标时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

此效果持续到偷猎者再次指定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}。

Priest of Pharasma.name: 法莱斯玛祭司 Priest of Pharasma
Priest of Pharasma.publicNotes:
避世的祭祀保护着他们的神庙和社群。他们是神祇教义的坚定守护者，致力于传播福音。他们的指导或治疗服务是以捐赠为代价的。

宗教能激励虔诚的信徒坚守信条。这些信徒中的大多数都试图带来救赎和希望，但也有一些人怀着更黑暗的动机。

Healing Hands.name: 治愈之手 Healing Hands
Healing Hands.description: 当祭司施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}时，采用d10而不是d8。

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 如果反应动作会打断祭司的施法动作，则尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:15]检定。如果成功，祭司的动作不会被打断。

Prisoner.name: 囚犯 Prisoner
Prisoner.publicNotes:
大多数最终被关进监狱、地牢或监牢的人只能在监狱里打发时间，试图寻找方法来度过漫长而无聊的被剥夺自由的日子，直到监禁结束。然而有些人可能会利用在监狱里的时间来加强和其他罪犯的联系。他们使用武力或恐吓来在囚犯中获得地位，他们制造临时武器用来对付敌人，或期望在逃跑的时候能获得一点优势。即便那些没有在监狱中参与帮派斗争的囚犯来说，也需要学会表现出强硬的态度，因为要在监狱这种几乎一无所有的环境中生存，这是必不可少的。

不幸的是，每个社会都有生活在底层的人。虽然好的社区会为底层人民提供帮助，但是有时——由于经济衰退、饥荒或战争——社会无力负担这些不幸的人。在无情的中立或邪恶的社会中，贫穷是一种不可避免的现象，永远无法真正根除，而更糟糕的情况是，贫穷被当做一种被操纵用来获取整治利益的工具。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
囚犯对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 在战斗的第一轮中，如果囚犯以欺骗或隐秘进行先攻检定，尚未行动的生物都会对囚犯@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

You're Next.name: 下一个就是你 You're Next
You're Next.description:
触发 囚犯将一个生物的生命值削减至0；

效果 囚犯尝试一次+2环境加值的威吓检定来对一个生物进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}，该生物必须和囚犯互相能看见对方。

Privateer Captain.name: 私掠船长 Privateer Captain
Privateer Captain.publicNotes:
这名水手的衣服下摆结了一层淡淡的盐屑，她的三角帽檐下沿透出冰冷刺骨的目光。

私掠船长也被一些人轻蔑的称为海盗或海贼，他们指挥着一帮忠诚的船员，在内海和外海的水域中穿梭。当然，私掠船长的目标是利益和名望，但他们也会参与保障航线自由，赶走那些妄图在自由的大海上执行陆地法律的海军。暴君和奴隶贩子是他们最爱的目标，许多贪婪的殖民者或人口贩子在交出他们的奴隶后就被送进了海底。在通常情况下私掠船长会愿意释放奴隶，这样他们可能会得到赎金，并在整个地区宣传火烙党的行动。

私掠船长通常是登船队的先锋。他们中的许多人呼唤女神贝丝玛拉（Besmara）的力量，在战斗中为船员提供增益，并把每次登船袭击当做对女神的奉献。就像在甲板上那样，私掠船长乐于跳进海里去追击敌人或营救落水的船员。虽然私掠船长可能会悬挂伪装旗帜或在战斗前欺骗敌方，但是他们通常会遵守投降协议，并且信守承诺，尤其是在和其他火烙党成员打交道的时候。

哪里有压迫和冒险的机会，哪里就有火烙党尾随而至。PC遭遇的这些火烙党成员可能是寻求正义、反抗奴隶主压迫的盟友，或者是和PC怀着同样目的去争夺某处宝藏的友好（或不那么友好）的竞争对手。这里列出的“迷人的恶棍”可以作为低级的自由斗士或阻碍PC们的对手登场，或者是作为后面“私掠船长”手下的船员。而“私掠船长”可以为PC提供前往危险地点的运输工具，或亦敌亦友，在最意想不到的情况下提供及时的支援，也能充当和PC相互竞争的探险家，也可以作为强大而致命的敌人登场。

Reach Spell.name: 法术及远 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: 如果私掠船长的下一个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast a Spell}一个带有射程的法术，则增加法术的射程30尺。如果法术的射程为“接触”，则该法术的射程改为30尺。

Sink or Swim.name: 谁主沉浮 Sink or Swim
Sink or Swim.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 私掠船长能影响周身的水体。在1分钟之内，如果60尺内的一个盟友成功通过游泳的运动检定，则得到大成功的结果。如果60尺内的敌人在游泳的运动检定中失败，则得到大失败的结果。

在能力持续时间内，私掠船长60尺内的敌人会把周身的水流视为湍流（如果尚未变得更汹涌的话），@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim}的@Check[type:athletics|dc:20]检定DC为20，或采用水域的通常DC，二者以更高的为准。

Prophet.name: 先知 Prophet
Prophet.publicNotes:
一些神偶尔会在梦中向四处流浪的人传达启示，先知以出色的演讲能力获得追随者。一些先知其实并没有真正地收到过神谕，他们只是曲解了正常的梦境。

宗教能激励虔诚的信徒坚守信条。这些信徒中的大多数都试图带来救赎和希望，但也有一些人怀着更黑暗的动机。

Rain-Scribe.name: 雨幕书生 Rain-Scribe
Rain-Scribe.publicNotes:
这个目光敏锐的半精灵穿戴着可以轻易融入任何自然地形的老旧装备，并携带着一根精心雕刻的手杖。

当一群专家离开玛甘比学院时，无论是为了调查神奇的异像，执行外交任务，还是访问遥远的土地的学者，雨幕书生常作为他们的向导。作为在艰难环境中旅行的专家，雨幕书生为他们的同伴提供帮助，同时帮助他们避免许多在内海旅行时可能遭遇的危险。雨幕书生是学院里最频繁出外勤的人员，他们大多数都与人结盟，并确保在他们经过的土地上行开辟出安全的通道。

如果雨幕书生或他们的盟友在旅途中被攻击，雨幕书生能发挥出自己的战斗特长，努力将他们和自然世界的交流转化为战斗中的最大优势。无论是用原能魔法对付得人，还是从灌木丛中发起隐秘突袭，雨幕书生们保证没有敌人能长时间威胁他们的同伴。

在过去的十年里，不可思议的事件频频撼动阿维斯坦的土地，从整个城市在时间循环中再次出现，到魔法爆炸让绞首塔（Gallowspire）监狱汽化。这些可怕又令人畏惧的惊奇事件不可避免地引起了玛甘比学院的注意，该学院是各种施法者的家园。学者、使者和密探们在北部建立了玛甘比分部，试图学习并帮助那些可以帮助的人。

Chameleon Step.name: 变色龙快步 Chameleon Step
Chameleon Step.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 雨幕书生必须位于自然地形。

效果 雨幕书生改变自己和装备的颜色，以适应自然环境，然后立即尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneaks}，即便它处于可见状态。雨幕书生必须在结束移动时获得隐蔽状态或者位于掩体后方，才能保持藏匿或无踪。

Reckless Scientist.name: Reckless Scientist
Reckless Scientist.publicNotes:
It's the reckless scientist's job to break the rules of reality, no matter the cost.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Infused Items.name: Infused Items
Infused Items.description:
A reckless scientist carries the following infused items:

  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Acid Flask (Moderate)},
  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)},
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.T4ouD4mVFHA3EHs6]{Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)},
  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.nVvH1ZcM7OwIVIs8]{Frost Vial (Moderate)},
  • 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Elixir of Life (Lesser)}

These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time the scientist makes their daily preparations.

Unstable Compounds.name: Unstable Compounds
Unstable Compounds.description: When an attacker scores a critical hit against the reckless scientist, one of the scientist's poorly stowed alchemical items bursts. The GM determines the item randomly. If it was a bomb, the alchemist takes damage from the bomb, and any creature adjacent to the alchemist takes the splash damage. Any other item is simply wasted.

Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: The reckless scientist @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

Reckless Alchemy.name: Reckless Alchemy
Reckless Alchemy.description:
需求 The reckless scientist is holding a bomb or elixir

效果 The reckless scientist combines the bomb with another bomb or the elixir with another elixir. They can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact} to draw a second bomb or elixir if necessary as part of this action. They attempt a @Check[type:crafting|dc:28] check, destroying both component items to create one new item.

If a viable resulting item isn't used by the end of the scientist's next turn, it explodes as described under critical failure.

Critical Success The new item has the full effect of both component items when used.

Success The new item combines both items, but halves the effect of each. (This halves damage for bombs, the amount of healing of elixirs of life, or the duration for effects that can't have their value halved. Details are determined by the GM.)

Failure The new item is inert.

Critical Failure The new item immediately explodes, dealing [[/r {3d6}[piercing]]]{3d6 piercing damage} to the reckless scientist.

Ruffian.name: 暴徒 Ruffian
Ruffian.publicNotes:
暴徒用自己的力量迫使他人屈服，经常为强大的犯罪者例如江湖骗子或走私者充当保镖和护卫。

一些罪犯是走投无路的人，他们别无选择只能通过行违法之事来生存，而另一些人选择犯罪来寻求愉悦，组成帮派或地下组织，专门从事非法活动。

Brutal Beating.name: 蛮力打击 Brutal Beating
Brutal Beating.description:
暴徒的残忍动摇了敌人的士气。

当暴徒造造成重击且造成伤害时，目标会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，并且暴徒可以击退最多10尺（强制移动）。

Snagging Strike.name: 妨碍之击 Snagging Strike
Snagging Strike.description:
触发 暴徒有一只手空闲，并且暴徒的目标并在这只手的触及范围之内；

效果 暴徒在一只手空闲的情况下进行近战打击。如果打击命中，目标直到暴徒的下一轮开始，或直到它离开暴徒的触及范围（以先发生的情况为准），否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
暴徒对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Saboteur.name: Saboteur
Saboteur.publicNotes:
Saboteurs excel at infiltration, using it to perform destructive acts, whether they are the physical destruction of a valuable object or obstructing important political proceedings. Unlike those of spies, the motivations of saboteurs is not to steal information, but rather to sow chaos among their enemies.

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

Snare Crafting.name: Snare Crafting
Snare Crafting.description: The saboteur can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} snares and has the supplies to make up to two @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.kF761P3ibBIFmLm9]{Caltrop Snares} and up to two @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Km4lSOsyrip5q6iD]{Hampering Snares}.

+2 status to reflex saves vs. traps.name: 对抗陷阱时反射豁免+2状态加值

+2 status to perception to find traps.name: 寻找陷阱时察觉+2状态加值

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The saboteur deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Sage.name: Sage
Sage.publicNotes:
The greatest knowledge comes from experience. Village elders, ancient seers, and advisors to royalty are examples of individuals who are valued for their experiences. Sages serve their people as much as their sovereigns. They educate and try to prevent their people from straying from their cultures' acceptable norms and traditions. Sages rarely take power for themselves, as they take their responsibility seriously to guide wisely and empower those they serve.

True power comes from knowledge: the power to shape the growth of kingdoms by mere whispers, staying three steps ahead of adversaries, or even knowing which flora is best for creating untraceable poisons.

Timely Advice.name: Timely Advice
Timely Advice.description:
触发 An ally is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check and has not yet rolled

效果 The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.FISKjI7bal26AnyL]{效果: Timely Advice}

Sage's Analysis.name: Sage's Analysis
Sage's Analysis.description:
The sage studies a creature, attempting an Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion, or Society check against the creature's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} DC. On a success, the sage gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and AC against that creature and deals an additional [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6 damage} to the creature with weapon attacks.

These benefits last for 1 minute or until the sage uses this ability again.

Servant.name: Servant
Servant.publicNotes:
Maids, butlers, and majordomos alike, servants are skilled at keeping a home in working order and protecting the interests of their employers.

Every day, laborers perform backbreaking physical work.

Raise a Shield.name: Raise a Shield
Raise a Shield.description:
The serving platter has the same statistics as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}, but requires a hand to hold.

需求 You are wielding a shield

You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.4hfQEMiEOBbqelAh]{Raise a Shield}

Server.name: Server
Server.publicNotes:
Always on the move from patron to patron, servers are the backbone of any tavern or eatery. Their work hones both their agility and their diplomacy.

Countless adventures begin in a tavern or a pub. Maybe it's because such places attract the risk-prone, or maybe it's because everyone needs a little liquid courage before they decide to take on a group of rampaging ogres.

Quick Catch.name: Quick Catch
Quick Catch.description:
触发 An object that the server could hold in one hand is dropped within the server's reach

需求 The server has at least one hand free

效果 The server catches the dropped object before it hits the floor or leaves their reach.

Ship Captain.name: Ship Captain
Ship Captain.publicNotes:
The captain is the ultimate authority on a vessel, responsible for the livelihood and well-being of everyone on the ship.

Adventurers may need passage on a swift vessel, or they might face danger from raiders at sea or in coastal settlements.

Bravery.name: Bravery
Bravery.description: When the Ship Captain rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

Dual Disarm.name: Dual Disarm
Dual Disarm.description:
The captain makes two Strikes, one with their rapier and one with their main-gauche} (in either order). If both Strikes hit, the ship captain can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target.

Their multiple attack penalty increases only after all the attacks are made.

No Quarter!.name: No Quarter!
No Quarter!.description:
The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a+1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.TjRZbd52qWPjTbNT]{效果: No Quarter!}

Smith.name: Smith
Smith.publicNotes:
Most smaller communities have at least one smithy where locals and travelers can have horses shod or equipment repaired. Larger settlements and cities often have a variety of smiths, many specializing in blacksmithing, weapon smithing, armor smithing, or even smelting coins in a mint. The smith is a 6th-level challenge when competing with smithing or other crafting tasks.

Every settlement needs tradespeople to create new products, facilitate commerce, and keep the infrastructure from crumbling. Larger cities often have entire guilds dedicated to the creation of specific goods, managing worker conditions, and working with local governments.

Smith's Fury.name: Smith's Fury
Smith's Fury.description: The smith deals an additional [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 damage} when they hit with a weapon they created.

Spy.name: 间谍 Spy
Spy.publicNotes:
没有间谍的帝国是不完整的。间谍是潜入宫廷并融入其中的高手：他们可能是贵族之一，也可能是女王心爱的蓝颜知己，甚至可能是宫廷小丑。间谍利用他们的技巧巧妙地操纵庭臣，使敌人相互对立，并收集有价值的信息，或用于勒索，或把情报卖给出价最高的人。

虽然冒险家们穿过黑暗的地牢，跨过危险的荒野，但有时候对他们来说最险象环生的地方其实是贵族宫廷。

Noble's Ally.name: 贵族盟友 Noble's Ally
Noble's Ally.description: 间谍将自己定位成贵族值得信赖的盟友，在对贵族的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gather Information}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}检定中获得+2环境加值。

Hidden Blade.name: 匿迹之刃 Hidden Blade
Hidden Blade.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 间谍抽出武器然后用它进行一次打击。打击的目标对此次攻击视为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
间谍对陷入措手不及的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Stone Giant Monk.name: 石巨人武僧 Stone Giant Monk
Stone Giant Monk.tokenName: 石巨人武僧 Stone Giant Monk

Big Swing.name: 大回摆 Big Swing
Big Swing.description:
石巨人进行一次拳击打击。如果命中，目标被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{推离 Pushed}10尺，重击则为20尺。

如果目标碰撞到坚硬物体或坠落地面，则它受到等同于其移动距离的坠落伤害（钝击）。

Surgeon.name: Surgeon
Surgeon.publicNotes:
The surgeon specializes in the physical alteration of the body to prevent the spread of disease, removing necrotic and decaying flesh to help the whole to survive. Few healers know the science of anatomy and physiology better than the surgeon. While their expertise is of grave importance in the medical world, the downside is that when one is in need of their talents, it is likely the complaint is serious. In medical matters, a surgeon is a 6th-level challenge.

The world is a dangerous place. Thankfully, there are those who devote their lives to easing the pain and suffering of others.

Doctor's Hand.name: Doctor's Hand
Doctor's Hand.description: When the surgeon rolls a critical failure on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, they get a failure instead.

Medical Malpractice.name: Medical Malpractice
Medical Malpractice.description:
The surgeon attempts a Medicine check against the Fortitude DC of one living creature they can see within 60 feet.

On a success, the surgeon's melee Strikes deal an extra [[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6精准伤害} against that creature ([[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6精准伤害} on a critical success) until 1 minute passes or the surgeon critically hits that creature, whichever comes first.

Using this action again designates a new target and ends the effect for any previous target. A surgeon can target an individual creature no more than once per day with this ability.

Tax Collector.name: Tax Collector
Tax Collector.publicNotes:
Ledgers and marks, positive and negative flows, and levies and allotments are a tax collector's daily bread. Where coin is gained, from whom it is collected, and to whom is it disbursed are their main concerns; the collector is unconcerned with whether the taxed can afford it or take a loan to make up for any shortfall. However, tax collectors aren't immune to corruption: arrangements can be made, deals discussed, documents altered, or coin misappropriated. When dealing with matters of taxes and finance, the tax collector is a 3rd-level challenge.

Magistrates are the cogs and gears that keep bureaucracy running, moving the machine along under the inertia of the status quo.

Glittering Distraction.name: Glittering Distraction
Glittering Distraction.description: The tax collector Strides. At any point during this movement, they can Interact to hurl coins. If there are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.npc-gallery.xY2WjwebqTNXAP0q]{Commoners} about, this typically causes a scene. Crowds are usually difficult terrain and have other effects.

Teacher.name: Teacher
Teacher.publicNotes:
The passing of knowledge and traditions from generation to generation is a time-honored occupation. Teachers exist to strengthen their populations with literacy, history, and advanced sciences, but most of all with inspiration. Most teachers provide general knowledge so their students are well rounded, but some are experts or even masters of a single discipline. A teacher typically knows three languages in addition to Common. For academic encounters, a teacher is a 4th-level challenge.

True power comes from knowledge: the power to shape the growth of kingdoms by mere whispers, staying three steps ahead of adversaries, or even knowing which flora is best for creating untraceable poisons.

Font of Knowledge.name: Font of Knowledge
Font of Knowledge.description: The teacher can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} on any general subject with a [[/br 1d20+10 #Recall Knowledge]]{+10 modifier}.

Inspirational Presence.name: Inspirational Presence
Inspirational Presence.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any of the teacher's students in the aura gains a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.CiCG3r7SHYMJeUxz]{效果: Inspirational Presence}

Tempest-Sun Mage.name: 岚阳法师 Tempest-Sun Mage
Tempest-Sun Mage.publicNotes:
这位学者的脸上带着一个雕刻着坚忍的豹子面孔的木制面具。

岚阳法师是被选中的玛甘比学院和周围土地的保护者，他们会在天空中观察来任何来自周围丛林的入侵迹象。他们与同伴之间的亲密关系和他们对魔法力量的广博知识同样为人所知，许多法师将重要盟友的名字刻在他们的衣服或装备上，以提醒他们保持警惕和献身精神的原因。岚阳法师们的勤奋和力量确保了没有任何入侵者能接近玛甘比学院20英里的范围内。

当岚阳法师们不需要守卫学院，也不需要陪同特使或老师们前往遥远的地点时，他们会利用自身对奥术和原能魔法的掌握来警戒周边的城市，甚至更进一步，密切关注整个忙吉莽原的力量平衡。这种魔法般的智慧通常能让他们在任何有威胁的组织出现之前就能预见到学院或周围城市所面临的危险。

岚阳法师们通常喜欢使敌人失去战斗能力，并随时召唤传智学派（Uzunjati）的同伴们和敌人对话，但他们会毫不犹豫地释放致命的力量，在空中降下元素之怒来对付危险的强敌。恶魔是他们尤其不能容忍的，因为他们之前遭受过居住在乌萨罗（Usaro）的恶魔领主安加赞（Angazhan）的崇拜者们的攻击。

在过去的十年里，不可思议的事件频频撼动阿维斯坦的土地，从整个城市在时间循环中再次出现，到魔法爆炸让绞首塔（Gallowspire）监狱汽化。这些可怕又令人畏惧的惊奇事件不可避免地引起了玛甘比学院的注意，该学院是各种施法者的家园。学者、使者和密探们在北部建立了玛甘比分部，试图学习并帮助那些可以帮助的人。

Mask Bond.name: 汲取面具 Mask Bond
Mask Bond.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 岚阳法师在自己的回合中还未行动；

效果 岚阳法师汲取联结物品，也就是面具中的力量。他能施展一个当天准备并且已经施展过的法术，不需要花费法术位。他还是需要采取@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast the Spell}行动并满足法术的其他需求。

Reach Spell.name: 及远法术 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: 如果岚阳法师下个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast a Spell}，并且法术有射程，那法术的射程增加30尺。如果有法术的射程为接触，那他可以把它的射程变成30尺。

Tomb Raider.name: 古墓探险家 Tomb Raider
Tomb Raider.publicNotes:
伟大的宝藏正等待着那些愿意探索世界深处的古老墓穴和被遗忘的地下城的人。一些古墓探险家寻求古代宝藏，另一些则致力于恢复那些已经淹没在时间流沙中的历史残片。

世界是广阔而充满危险的。探险家们利用他们的自然知识和生存技能走遍了世界的每一个角落。

Hazard Spotter.name: 危害警觉 Hazard Spotter
Hazard Spotter.description: 古墓探险家在接近危害10尺范围内之后会自动尝试一次针对危害的秘密察觉检定。

Trick Attack.name: 诡击 Trick Attack
Trick Attack.description:
古墓探险家善于巧妙地攻击敌人，让敌人猝不及防。

古墓探险家选择一种武器，该武器的下次攻击额外造成[[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6精准伤害}。

此外，古墓探险家还能同时以一个交互动作拔出该武器（或如果选择的是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{手弩 Hand Crossbow}的话可以进行装填）。

Torchbearer.name: 火炬手 Torchbearer
Torchbearer.publicNotes:
火炬手为经验丰富的探险者提供光源，并充当他们的学徒。

世界是广阔而充满危险的。探险家们利用他们的自然知识和生存技能走遍了世界的每一个角落。

Torch Combatant.name: 火炬战士 Torch Combatant
Torch Combatant.description: 火炬手擅长于使用火炬进行攻击，当他们用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8Jdw4yAzWYylGePS]{火炬 Torch}造成重击的时候会造成[[/r {1}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

Tracker.name: 追踪者 Tracker
Tracker.publicNotes:
森林为危险的生物提供了藏身之所——无论它们是用四条腿走路还是两条腿走路。昏暗的灯光、低矮的灌木和落叶掩盖了它们的踪迹。在这样困难的条件下，菜鸟可能只能发现一两处痕迹，但熟练的追踪者可以识别出很多这样的痕迹并判别出它们之间的相互关系，把它们串成一条线：足迹、粪便、毛皮和血液，最后找到生物的巢穴。

从村庄掌管和耕种的树林，到只有贵族和他们的仆人们才被允许狩猎的皇家猎场，森林为社区提供了燃料、食物、药材和其他原材料，而皇家保护的森林为贵族们的餐桌提供了食物，并且为组织狩猎这一娱乐活动提供了场地。即使是未被凡人的双手和利刃触及的原始森林，也为诗人的传说提供了故事舞台。许多人觉得森林深处让人不安，但是也有一些人生活在树木的包围中，与那些以森林为家的生物一同生活。

Forager.name: 采集者 Forager
Forager.description: 每当追踪者使用生存技能进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{求生 Subsist}动作时，如果检定结果低于成功，则自动获得成功结果。如果追踪者在求生时获得了成功，你可以为自己加上另外16个生物提供足以维生程度的饮食和住所；如果大成功，则提升为32个生物。

Master Tracker.name: 追踪大师 Master Tracker
Master Tracker.description: 追踪者能以满速度进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
追踪者指定一只他们能看到和听到的动物，或他们正在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}的动物，作为他们的猎杀目标。

追踪者在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}时的察觉检定和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}时的生存检定获得+2加值。

追踪者每轮第一次击中猎杀目标时额外造成[[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害}。追踪者在对抗猎杀目标时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

此效果持续到追踪者再次指定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}。

Troubadour.name: Troubadour
Troubadour.publicNotes:
Troubadours keep alive the traditional songs of their cultural and write original works to commemorate major events.

Performances can serve as entertainment, expressions of beauty, or part of a shared culture.

Bardic Lore.name: Bardic Lore
Bardic Lore.description: The troubadour can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} on any subject with a +7 modifier.

Urchin.name: 顽童 Urchin
Urchin.publicNotes:
虽然顽童们的恶作剧行为臭名昭著，但是只有很少的顽童单纯只是为了刺激才这么做。对于一些顽童来说，当乞讨不足以让他们填饱肚子时，盗窃就成了一种可行的生存策略。许多地下势力还会利用顽童作为间谍和信使，同时训练他们成为未来的杀手、窃贼或士兵。

不幸的是，每个社会都有生活在底层的人。虽然好的社区会为底层人民提供帮助，但是有时——由于经济衰退、饥荒或战争——社会无力负担这些不幸的人。在无情的中立或邪恶的社会中，贫穷是一种不可避免的现象，永远无法真正根除，而更糟糕的情况是，贫穷被当做一种被操纵用来获取整治利益的工具。

Collaborative Thievery.name: 合作偷窃 Collaborative Thievery
Collaborative Thievery.description: 当顽童10尺范围内有一名具有扒手能力的同伴在场时，他的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{偷窃 Steal}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{手上功夫 Palm an Object}有+1环境加值。

Pickpocket.name: 扒手 Pickpocket
Pickpocket.description: 顽童可以在严密看守的情况下进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{偷窃 Steal}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{手上功夫 Palm an Object}而不受到通常的-5减值。他们可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{偷窃 Steal}那些非常引人注目或者需要花费时间去移动的物品（例如穿着的鞋子、盔甲或已经启动的手持物品）。

Veteran Reclaimer.name: 救国骑士老兵 Veteran Reclaimer
Veteran Reclaimer.publicNotes:
这个头发斑白的半兽人挥舞着一把长弓，她像熟悉自己身体的一部分一样熟悉它。

当终焉之墙陨落时，许多奥泽姆骑士变得灰心丧气，四处漂泊，漫无目的的在内海的荒野中游荡。虽然导致终焉之墙陨落的恐怖事件动摇了他们对传统骑士等级制度的信仰，但是坚定了他们在整个格拉利昂铲除所有亡灵的决心。这些绯红复国骑士依然将默语暴君视为他们的主要敌人，但是他们的足迹遍布于世界上许多作祟最为严重的地区。他们扎根在当地，猎杀躁动的亡灵。

虽然他们的胸膛里依然燃烧着英雄主义和对事业的热情，但是救国骑士老兵已经活得足够久，已经不再喜欢那些荣耀、英勇、牺牲的传奇故事了。他们学会了谨慎行事，因此会先用远程攻击和地利之便打击敌人。当敌人伤害到盟友的时候，他们会快速反击，因为他们知道在面对世界上的种种恐怖之物时，可靠的队友必不可少。

虽然终焉之墙被摧毁，领导者也已经流亡，但那些曾经保卫它闪耀城墙的人的勇气依然强大。终焉之墙骑士常出现在发生重大危难的地方，他们保护平民，击退亡灵。如果PC们冒险进入某个危险区域，不一定能见到终焉之墙骑士。因为他们可能忙着建立保护平民的城墙或者正深入最勇敢的人也有所畏惧的致命废土。这些骑士们在那些极少出现友善面孔的地方是非常宝贵的盟友，除非PC们属于邪恶阵营，或者这些骑士们被塔-巴冯（Tar-Baphon）的特工也就是默语魔道所欺骗。下文中的“正直的防卫者”可能是骑士小队中的一员，也可能作为招募官，招募那些愿意冒生命危险将阿维斯坦从可怕的危机中拯救出来的人。而“救国骑士老兵”则可能在某个陵墓或被遗忘的遗迹深处和玩家遭遇，在哪里即使是轻微的失误也可能导致死亡或更糟糕的结果。这些足智多谋且正直的人可能会回应请求，带领人们到达安全的地方、在未知的领地充当向导、或者提供有价值的建议和消息，告诉PC们前方可能遭遇的危险和陷阱。
Veteran Reclaimer.tokenName: 救国骑士老兵 Veteran Reclaimer

Weapon Mastery.name: 武器掌握 Weapon Mastery

许多闪亮哨兵侍奉善良神祇，例如艾奥梅黛；在战斗中，他们用神赐的力量对抗敌人。这些善良的战士把同伴的性命看得比自身安全更重要，并且常常保持防御姿态来庇护盟友。

Retributive Strike.name: 报复打击 Retributive Strike
Retributive Strike.description:
正直防卫者在进行报应打击之前可以进行一次快步以确保敌人在触及范围内。

伤害减免 6

Shield Ally.name: 坚盾盟友 Shield Ally
Shield Ally.description: 正直防卫者的盾牌在他们手中时更结实。上述数据中已经包含了这一能力带来的好处；对于其他人来说这只是一块普通钢盾。

Warden.name: Warden
Warden.publicNotes:
Wardens are the chief guardians of borders and frontiers. Whether they stand watch over a single village or an entire region, wardens keep a vigilant eye out for outside threats to their charges. Wardens are stalwart folk, often called to duty by Erastil to protect those around them. Be it times of war or upon the frontier, wardens are often the balanced edge of a blade between a community and the wilds at its fringes.

Magistrates are the cogs and gears that keep bureaucracy running, moving the machine along under the inertia of the status quo.

Warding Strike.name: Warding Strike
Warding Strike.description:
触发 One of the warden's enemies within 100 feet attacks one of the warden's allies or a person the warden is sworn to protect

效果 The warden Strikes the triggering enemy. If the Strike hits, the enemy's attack is deflected, reducing its damage by 8, or by 16 if the warden's Strike was a critical hit.

Warden's Protection.name: Warden's Protection
Warden's Protection.description: A warden deals an extra [[/r 1d8]] damage to any creature trespassing on the territory the warden protects.

Watch Officer.name: Watch Officer
Watch Officer.publicNotes:
Watch officers are assigned to a certain area within a city or community. Often leading a small team of lower-ranking guards, they patrol those areas to maintain order and enforce laws. Watch officers get the job done, though their methods are not always gentle or kind. Because the watch officer is responsible to their superiors for their area, they sometimes need to make tough decisions between justice and effectiveness.

Larger societies rely on those with the authority and the ability to interpret and enforce laws. In good-aligned societies, these officials carry out their duties fairly. In neutral and evil ones, these officials can be harsh and cruel (with an altered alignment to reflect this), imposing severe punishments on those who can't pay for mercy.

Air of Authority.name: Air of Authority
Air of Authority.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Creatures in the aura who are the same or lower level than the watch officer take a -2 status penalty to their Will DC against the watch officer's attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} them.

Bravery.name: Bravery
Bravery.description: When the watch officer rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition, reduce its value by 1.

Sudden Charge.name: Sudden Charge
Sudden Charge.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The watch officer Strides twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

Zealot of Asmodeus.name: 阿斯摩蒂斯狂信者 Zealot of Asmodeus
Zealot of Asmodeus.publicNotes:
狂信者会查找那些反对他们宗教信仰的阴谋，为他们教会的信徒寻求正义。这里列出的狂信徒为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.QRkcFciCOmFoxF1B]{阿斯摩蒂斯 Asmodeus}服务，但是其他人可能为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.d56paSkcwvll2OhR]{阿巴达尔 Abadar}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.AlL9GtlTldbqNoVm]{卡莉丝翠 Calistria}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.eErEiVmBqltYXFJ6]{艾奥梅黛 Iomedae}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.GX6PF9ifR47Xyjg9]{诺格巴 Norgorber}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{法莱斯玛 Pharasma}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{莎琳 Sarenrae}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.ZfN7jkK6boU1FuiS]{宗-库山 Zon-Kuthon}服务。他们通常骑乘穿着轻型马铠的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Jy2va0NTTbaUH1zP]{战马 War Horse}。战马在战斗中算额外的敌人。

宗教能激励虔诚的信徒坚守信条。这些信徒中的大多数都试图带来救赎和希望，但也有一些人怀着更黑暗的动机。

Swear Vengeance.name: 发誓复仇 Swear Vengeance
Swear Vengeance.description:
触发 一个狂信者视线所及的生物，伤害了一名狂信者自身之外的阿斯莫蒂斯的信徒；

效果 狂信者获得1环法术@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike}效果。如果狂信者对触发生物以外的其他目标进行攻击检定，则克敌机先效果结束且不产生任何作用。

Channel Smite.name: 导能打击 Channel Smite
Channel Smite.description: 狂信者花费一个已准备的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}，并且进行一次近战打击。取代原本的法术效果，此负能量伤害会加到普通打击的伤害上。

Deadly Simplicity.name: 简单致命 Deadly Simplicity
Deadly Simplicity.description: 狂信者的硬头锤造成1d8伤害而非1d6。
